NK016(ma)003:0: dam tshig thams cad kyi nyams chag skong ba'i lung /
NK016(ma)003:1: bshags pa thams cad kyi rgyud dri ma med pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
NK016(ma)003:3: sa ma ya sarba bi ti a nu sarba sa ni tan+t+ra bi ma la r+aa dza na ma /
NK016(ma)003:5: dam tshig thams cad kyi nyams chag skong ba'i lung /
NK016(ma)003:6: bshags pa thams cad kyi rgyud dri ma med pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba /
NK016(ma)003:7: bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:8: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na /
NK016(ma)003:9: ri ma la ya gnam lcags yod pa'i rtse mo //
NK016(ma)003:10: seng ge'i za 'gram lta bur gyur pa'i gnas /
NK016(ma)003:11: dus gsum gyi rgyal ba rnams kyi byin gyis brlabs
NK016(ma)003:12: pa'i rin po che'i khang pa rang byung du grub
NK016(ma)003:13: pa na / bcon ldan 'das gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje /
NK016(ma)003:14: sku gsum gyi ston pa rnams kyi gsung gi tshogs ma lus par sdud cing /
NK016(ma)003:16: 'gro ba rnams kyi bla ma chen por gyur pa de la /
NK016(ma)003:17: 'khor du gyur pa'i theg pa chen po'i rigs can ni 'di lta ste /
NK016(ma)003:18: lang ka'i bdag po blo gros thabs ldan dang /
NK016(ma)003:19: klu'i rgyal po gtsug na rin chen blo gros rgya mtsho dang /
NK016(ma)003:20: tshangs pa gtsug phud 'dzin blo gros mtha' yas dang /
NK016(ma)003:21: gnod sbyin skar mda' gdong blo gros dad sel dang /
NK016(ma)003:22: dri ma med par grags pa blo gros rab zhi la sogs pas bskor te bzhugs so //
NK016(ma)003:23: de'i tshe rig 'dzin gyi rgyal po kuny+dza ras stan
NK016(ma)003:24: las langs te phyag rnal 'byor gyi lugs su byas
NK016(ma)003:25: nas / 'di skad ces 'khor rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu gsol to //
NK016(ma)003:26: kye ho dpal ldan rdo rje gsang ba'i bdag /
NK016(ma)003:27: bya spyod rnal 'byor bla med pa'i //
NK016(ma)003:28: rgyud la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i //
NK016(ma)003:30: nyams chag bskang bshags cho ga rnams //
NK016(ma)003:31: phyi rabs da lta'i don du gsungs //
NK016(ma)003:33: de nas gsang ba'i bdag po dpal phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad gsungs so //
NK016(ma)003:34: kye ho dam pa'i rigs can rnams //
NK016(ma)003:35: dam tshig sa gzhi lta bu la //
NK016(ma)003:36: thams cad 'bras bu lo tog smin //
NK016(ma)003:37: gzhi srung so nam thabs 'bad pa //
NK016(ma)003:38: khyod la bshad kyis legs par nyon //
NK016(ma)003:40: mi zad pa rin po che'i gong bu zhes bya
NK016(ma)003:41: ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di
NK016(ma)003:43: sngon 'das pa'i dus dran pa dpag tu med pa'i sngon rol nas /
NK016(ma)003:44: ston pa chos kyi sku dang /
NK016(ma)003:45: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang /
NK016(ma)003:46: rdo rje lta bu'i sku dang /
NK016(ma)003:47: mngon par byang chub pa'i sku dang /
NK016(ma)003:49: sku lnga'i sangs rgyas rnams dang /
NK016(ma)003:50: sku bzhi'i sangs rgyas la sogs pa rnams kyis rgyud
NK016(ma)003:51: dag pa'i zhing byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gsungs
NK016(ma)003:52: pa'i rgyud sde mang po dang /
NK016(ma)003:53: rgyud ma dag pa la snang ba'i he ru ka rnams kyis /
NK016(ma)003:54: r+au tra la sogs pa rnams yang dag pa'i sa la lung bstan pa'i dus na /
NK016(ma)003:55: 'gyod tshangs kyi smre sngags brjod pa dang /
NK016(ma)003:56: de'i 'khor gyi rig 'dzin pho mo mang pos gsungs
NK016(ma)003:57: pa'i bshags pa rnams gsang ba'i dam tshig skong ba'i
NK016(ma)003:62: r+au tra 'khor dang bcas pa'i gshags pa rnams kyi rgyud chen po 'di gsungs so //
NK016(ma)003:66: de nas 'khor rnams kyis zhus pa /
NK016(ma)003:67: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dpag tu med pas gsungs pa dang /
NK016(ma)003:68: r+au tra la sogs pa dregs pa can dpag tu med pas 'gyod bshags phul ba dang /
NK016(ma)003:69: rig 'dzin rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rnams kyis bshags pa'i thabs rnams bshad par zhu /
NK016(ma)003:72: rnal 'byor pa rnams la phan pa'i don du shod //
NK016(ma)003:74: de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos rnam par
NK016(ma)003:75: 'byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas
NK016(ma)003:76: / gsang sngags pa rnams kyi bshags pa'i don dbye ba 'di gsungs so //
NK016(ma)003:77: kye ho yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
NK016(ma)003:78: kyi lam la gnas pa'i bla ma dam pa ni
NK016(ma)003:81: phyi sgro 'dogs yongs su gcod par byed pa'i bla ma dam pa dang /
NK016(ma)003:82: nang rang byung gi ye shes ston par byed pa'i bla ma dam pa dang /
NK016(ma)003:83: gsang ba lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes ston par byed pa'i bla ma dam pa dang /
NK016(ma)003:84: mthar thug de kho na nyid kyi chos thams cad
NK016(ma)003:85: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i de kho na nyid
NK016(ma)003:86: ston par byed pa'i bla ma dam pa'o //
NK016(ma)003:87: dam pa de dag gi lam la gnas par bya ba'ang rnam pa gsum yod de /
NK016(ma)003:89: gzhi dngos po gshis kyi gnas lugs ston par byed pa dang /
NK016(ma)003:90: lam nyams su len pa'i gdams ngag ston par byed pa dang /
NK016(ma)003:91: 'bras bu mngon sum du gyur pa'i don ston par byed ba'o //
NK016(ma)003:92: dam pa de'i lam rnam pa gsum gang yang rung ba ma rtogs pa'i bshags pa bya ba dang /
NK016(ma)003:93: khyad par du yang ma dag pa'i snang ba dang /
NK016(ma)003:95: dag pa'i snang ba rnams ma rtogs pa dang /
NK016(ma)003:98: phyag rgya chen po 'bras bu'i rgyud ma rtogs pa dang /
NK016(ma)003:101: 'bras bu'i rnal 'byor ma rtogs pa dang /
NK016(ma)003:102: bde bar gshegs pa'i bka' yang dag pa lung gi tshad ma dang /
NK016(ma)003:103: rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug nyams myong rjes su dran pa'i tshad ma dang /
NK016(ma)003:104: bla ma rdo rje slob dpon snyan khung brgyud pa man ngag gi tshad ma dang /
NK016(ma)003:105: dngos po'i mtha' rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba lo rgyus kyi tshad ma ma rtogs pa dang /
NK016(ma)003:106: de dag rtogs par bya ba'i phyir 'di dag bshad de /
NK016(ma)003:107: dbang gi chu bo ma nub pa dang /
NK016(ma)003:108: byin rlabs kyi brgyud pa ma nyams pa dang /
NK016(ma)003:109: gdams ngag gi sarga ma log pa dang /
NK016(ma)003:110: mos gus kyi bsam pa tshims par nus pa'i phyir /
NK016(ma)003:111: phyi'i rten 'brel dang nang gi rten 'brel dang /
NK016(ma)003:113: mthar thug de kho na nyid kyi rten 'brel bsgrigs nas /
NK016(ma)003:114: bde bar gshegs pa'i bka' tshad ma dang /
NK016(ma)003:115: bla ma'i man ngag tshad ma dang /
NK016(ma)003:116: rang gi rig pa tshad mas gtan la phab ste /
NK016(ma)003:119: spyod pa la dor nas gsang sngags gsang ba'i lam la zhugs pa rnams la /
NK016(ma)003:120: dam tshig nyams chag byung bar gyur na theg pa lam zhugs kyi bshags pa dang /
NK016(ma)003:121: na raka dong sprugs kyi bshags pa dang /
NK016(ma)003:123: dam tshig nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi bshags pa dang /
NK016(ma)003:126: zhi ba sangs rgyas khro bo khrag mthung dang /
NK016(ma)003:128: rgyud lung man ngag gi bshags pa dang /
NK016(ma)003:130: dbang bzhi rdzogs pa thabs lam gyi bshags pa dang /
NK016(ma)003:131: 'bras bu'i don rtogs sku gsung thugs su byung ba'i bshags pa rnams bshad par bya'o //
NK016(ma)003:133: dri med rgyal po bshags pa'i rgyud las /
NK016(ma)003:134: gleng gzhi dang gleng bslang ba'i le'u ste dang po'o //
NK016(ma)003:136: // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis theg pa lam zhugs kyi bshags pa 'di gsungs so //
NK016(ma)003:138: / dang po bdag dang khams gsum sems can rnams //
NK016(ma)003:139: yul la chags pa skye bar mi bgyid de //
NK016(ma)003:140: pha dang ma la brten nas gzugs su snang //
NK016(ma)003:141: rang dbang med par 'jig rten gnas 'di mthong //
NK016(ma)003:142: ma rig chung zhing gzhon pa'i dus mtshams na /
NK016(ma)003:143: gti mug dbang gis dge sdig don ma rtogs //
NK016(ma)003:144: 'dod chags dbang gis pha rol 'khor bar 'khyams //
NK016(ma)003:145: zhe sdang dbang gis sdig pa'i las rnams bgyis //
NK016(ma)003:146: ngan song gsum du 'gro ba'i rgyu bsags te //
NK016(ma)003:147: mno bsam shes nas chos la skyabs su mchi //
NK016(ma)003:148: dang bas nya stong dus drug sgor zhugs te //
NK016(ma)003:149: nya stong tshes brgyad dus khrims mnos pa las //
NK016(ma)003:150: de la nyams pa'i skyon sems ma mchis te //
NK016(ma)003:151: nya stong tshul bzhin srung ba'i dge bsnyen la //
NK016(ma)003:152: nyams pa bka' yi chad pa byung na bshags //
NK016(ma)003:153: de nas yar la blo sems cher skyes nas //
NK016(ma)003:154: sbyangs ba'i yon tan bcu gnyis sgor zhugs nas //
NK016(ma)003:155: nyan thos sdoms pa tshul bzhin mnos pa las //
NK016(ma)003:156: rtsa ba bzhi dang yan lag drug la sogs //
NK016(ma)003:157: nyis brgya lnga bcu'i khrims la skyon ma mchis //
NK016(ma)003:158: nyan thos 'dul khrims srung ba'i dge slong la //
NK016(ma)003:159: nyams pa bka' yi chad pa byung na bshags //
NK016(ma)003:160: de nas yar la blo sems cher skyes nas //
NK016(ma)003:161: rten 'brel bcu gnyis bsgrub pa'i sgor zhugs te //
NK016(ma)003:162: rang rgyal sdom pa tshul bzhin mnos pa las //
NK016(ma)003:163: 'khor ba rang bzhin med par mngon rtogs shing //
NK016(ma)003:164: snang srid sgyu ma lta bur shes pas na //
NK016(ma)003:165: de la nyams par bya ba'i skyon ma mchis //
NK016(ma)003:166: rang rgyal sdom pa srung ba'i dge slong la //
NK016(ma)003:167: nyams pa bka' yi chad pa byung na bshags //
NK016(ma)003:168: de nas yar la blo sems cher skyes nas //
NK016(ma)003:169: theg chen byang chub sems kyi sgor zhugs te //
NK016(ma)003:170: byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa mnos pa las //
NK016(ma)003:171: smon 'jug kun rdzob don dam byang chub sems //
NK016(ma)003:172: sdom pa nyi shu'i tshul khrims skyon ma mchis //
NK016(ma)003:173: de la nyams pa'i skyon lta ma mchis na //
NK016(ma)003:174: sdom brtson tshul bzhin srung ba'i dge slong la //
NK016(ma)003:175: nyams pa bka' yi chad pa byung na bshags //
NK016(ma)003:176: de nas yar la blo sems cher skyes nas //
NK016(ma)003:177: dag pa rnam pa gnyis kyi sgor zhugs te //
NK016(ma)003:178: kri ya'i dam tshig tshul bzhin mnos pa las //
NK016(ma)003:179: dkon mchog gsum dang rdo rje slob dpon dang //
NK016(ma)003:180: rdo rje spun dang rdo rje ming sring dang //
NK016(ma)003:181: de bzhin rang gi sngags dang phyag rgya rnams //
NK016(ma)003:182: de la nyams pa'i skyon lta ma mchis na //
NK016(ma)003:183: kri ya'i dam tshig srung ba'i rnal 'byor la //
NK016(ma)003:184: nyams pa bka' yi chad pa byung na bshags //
NK016(ma)003:185: de nas yar la blo sems cher skyes nas //
NK016(ma)003:186: u pa ya yi dam tshig sgor zhugs nas /
NK016(ma)003:187: phyag rgya sngags dang man ngag sgrub pa yi //
NK016(ma)003:188: lta spyod kri yog tshul srung rnal 'byor la //
NK016(ma)003:189: nyams pa bka' yi chad pa byung na bshags //
NK016(ma)003:190: de nas yar la blo sems cher skyes nas //
NK016(ma)003:191: lta spyod rnam pa gnyis kyi sgor zhugs nas //
NK016(ma)003:192: yo ga'i dam tshig tshul bzhin mnos pa las //
NK016(ma)003:193: dkon mchog gsum dang de 'khor byang chub sems //
NK016(ma)003:194: rdo rje bla ma mched dang lcam dral dang //
NK016(ma)003:195: dbang thob rnal 'byor gzhan la mi smod cing //
NK016(ma)003:196: rang rtags phyag rgya rtag tu srung ba la //
NK016(ma)003:197: de la nyams pa'i skyon lta ma mchis na //
NK016(ma)003:198: yo ga'i dam tshig srung ba'i rnal 'byor la //
NK016(ma)003:199: nyams pa bka' yi chad pa byung na bshags //
NK016(ma)003:200: de nas yar la blo sems cher skyes nas //
NK016(ma)003:201: thabs dang shes rab gnyis kyi sgo zhugs nas //
NK016(ma)003:202: ma h+aa yo ga'i dam tshig mnos pa las //
NK016(ma)003:203: 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das pa'i chos //
NK016(ma)003:204: yab lnga dang ni yum lngar sbyor bas na //
NK016(ma)003:205: rgyal ba'i dam tshig mchog tu gsungs pa las //
NK016(ma)003:206: ma h+aa yo ga srung ba'i rnal 'byor la //
NK016(ma)003:207: nyams pa bka' yi chad pa byung na bshags //
NK016(ma)003:208: de nas yar la blo sems cher skyes nas //
NK016(ma)003:209: dbyings dang ye shes gnyis kyi sgor zhugs nas //
NK016(ma)003:210: a nu yo ga'i dam tshig mnos pa las //
NK016(ma)003:211: phyi nang snang srid dus gsum thams cad kun //
NK016(ma)003:212: rang rig ye shes dbyings las mi gzhan te //
NK016(ma)003:213: rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya 'chang byed cing //
NK016(ma)003:214: a nu yo ga srung ba'i rnal 'byor la //
NK016(ma)003:215: nyams pa bka' yi chad pa byung na bshags //
NK016(ma)003:216: de nas yar la blo sems cher skyes nas //
NK016(ma)003:217: khyab gdal chen po theg pa'i sgor zhugs nas //
NK016(ma)003:218: a ti yo ga'i dam tshig mnos pa las //
NK016(ma)003:219: med pa'i dam tshig dang ni phyal pa dang //
NK016(ma)003:220: gcig pu'i dam tshig dang ni lhun gyis rdzogs //
NK016(ma)003:221: grangs dang phyogs las 'das pa'i dam tshig la //
NK016(ma)003:222: rgyal ba rnams kyis dam tshig mchog tu gsungs //
NK016(ma)003:223: bsrung mtshams med pas med pa'i dam tshig la //
NK016(ma)003:224: gzung dang 'dzin pa med pas phyal pa yin //
NK016(ma)003:225: thams cad sems su 'dus pas gcig pu nyid //
NK016(ma)003:226: lhag ma med par 'dus pas lhun gyis rdzogs //
NK016(ma)003:227: de la nyams pa'i skyon lta ma mchis na //
NK016(ma)003:228: a ti yo ga srung ba'i rnal 'byor la //
NK016(ma)003:229: nyams pa bka' yi chad pa byung na bshags //
NK016(ma)003:230: sde snod rnam pa gsum gyi bsrung bya ni //
NK016(ma)003:231: tshul khrims rnam par dag pas 'dul mthar phyin //
NK016(ma)003:232: rang dbang mngon du gyur pas mngon mthar phyin //
NK016(ma)003:233: shes rab rnam dag mdo sde'i mtha' ru phyin //
NK016(ma)003:234: phyi yi lha srin sde brgyad srung ma rnams //
NK016(ma)003:235: dam tshig nyams par gyur na mthol lo bshags //
NK016(ma)003:236: kri yog rnam pa gsum gyi bsrung bya ni //
NK016(ma)003:237: dag pa rnam gsum kri ya mtha' ru phyin //
NK016(ma)003:238: lta spyod gnyis med u pa ya mthar phyin //
NK016(ma)003:239: sum cu lha yi skur gsal rnal 'byor mtha' //
NK016(ma)003:240: dpal mgon bdun cu la sogs srung ma rnams //
NK016(ma)003:241: dam tshig nyams bar gyur na mthol lo bshags //
NK016(ma)003:242: yo ga rnam gsum dam tshig bsrung bya ni //
NK016(ma)003:243: rtsa ba yan lag srung ba rnal 'byor che //
NK016(ma)003:244: sgrub pa khyad par dam tshig a nu'i mtha' //
NK016(ma)003:245: lhag pa'i dam tshig rnam bzhi rdzogs chen pa //
NK016(ma)003:246: nang dang gsang ba'i lha srin sde brgyad rnams //
NK016(ma)003:247: dam tshig nyams par gyur na mthol lo bshags //
NK016(ma)003:248: mtshan nyid sde snod gsum dang theg pa gnyis //
NK016(ma)003:249: phyi pa thub pa rgyud la kri yog gsum //
NK016(ma)003:250: nang pa thabs kyi rgyud la yo ga gsum //
NK016(ma)003:251: theg pa rim pa dgu yi dam tshig rnams //
NK016(ma)003:252: lta spyod 'brel bar spyod pa'i rnal 'byor la //
NK016(ma)003:253: mkha' 'gro bka' yi chad pa ci ste bcad //
NK016(ma)003:254: dbang phyug thugs kyi sprul pa ci ste dgye //
NK016(ma)003:255: rgyu 'bras ma spangs dge ba dang du blangs //
NK016(ma)003:256: sdig pa ma spyad rnam par smin la 'dzem //
NK016(ma)003:257: bka' gzhung ma bor rgyud lung man ngag 'brangs //
NK016(ma)003:258: yal bar ma dor gzhung bzhin dang du blangs //
NK016(ma)003:259: lus ngag yid gsum btud nas gsang sngags chos //
NK016(ma)003:260: sgom sgrub spyod pa'i rnal 'byor dbang phyug la //
NK016(ma)003:261: dam tshig nyams chag byung na bskang gyur cig /
NK016(ma)003:262: rtsa ba yan lag pham ltung nyes byas dang //
NK016(ma)003:263: sbom po phra mo la sogs nyes skyon rnams //
NK016(ma)003:264: skyon du gyur pa thams cad tshangs par mdzod //
NK016(ma)003:265: mchog dang thun mong dngos grub rtsal du gsol //
NK016(ma)003:266: ye shes lha la rnam rtog mi mnga' yang //
NK016(ma)003:267: de 'khor bka' yi srung ma dam tshig can //
NK016(ma)003:268: thugs dang 'gal bar gyur na bzod par gsol //
NK016(ma)003:269: yun gyi sgrib pa mchis na sgrib pa sbyongs //
NK016(ma)003:270: 'phral gyi rkyen gegs mchis na rkyen gegs zlog /
NK016(ma)003:271: tshangs pa mchog gi dngos grub stsal du gsol //
NK016(ma)003:273: dri med rgyal po bshags pa'i rgyud las /
NK016(ma)003:274: theg pa lam zhugs kyi bshags pa ste le'u gnyis pa'o //
NK016(ma)003:276: // de nas gsang ba'i bdag po chen pos sngon gyi
NK016(ma)003:277: rnam par smin pa sbyangs pa lha'i bu'i rnal 'byor
NK016(ma)003:278: la / bcol ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po chen pos bshad pa dang /
NK016(ma)003:279: phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa rnams kyis zhus pa ni 'di lta ste /
NK016(ma)003:280: de nas phyogs bcu nas lhags pa'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rnams dang /
NK016(ma)003:281: rig 'dzin pho mo bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams kyis lhan cig tu brkyang phyag 'tshal zhing /
NK016(ma)003:282: bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po dang /
NK016(ma)003:283: che mchog he ru ka la sogs pa rigs lnga'i bde bar gshegs pa rnams la gsol ba /
NK016(ma)003:284: bdag cag rnams rang bzhin sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba'i dkyil
NK016(ma)003:285: 'khor gyi byin gyis rlabs kyis rnal 'byor gyi gral
NK016(ma)003:286: du 'khod de / gsang ba'i theg pa chen po 'di la spyod cing /
NK016(ma)003:287: bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po dang /
NK016(ma)003:288: che mchog he ru ka la sogs pa rnams kyi zhal mthong zhing /
NK016(ma)003:289: phyag rgya chen po'i rig 'dzin gyi sa la lhun gyis grub par 'tshal ba rnams nyams pa dang /
NK016(ma)003:291: bag chags ngan pas bsgribs te mchis pa la /
NK016(ma)003:292: nyams chag dang rtog sgrib sbyong ba'i thabs gsol zhing
NK016(ma)003:293: zhu na gnang ba'i skabs dbye bar gsol zhes zhus
NK016(ma)003:294: pa dang / de nas dpal kun tu bzang pos
NK016(ma)003:295: phyogs bcu nas lhags pa'i rig 'dzin pho mo rnams
NK016(ma)003:297: 'di lta bu'i bka' gsang ba las kyang shin tu ches gsang ba /
NK016(ma)003:298: yang gsang thugs kyi man ngag 'di lta bu ni /
NK016(ma)003:299: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyi bshegs shul /
NK016(ma)003:300: rig 'dzin pho mo rnams kyi lam /
NK016(ma)003:301: rnal 'byor pho moo rnams kyis sku gsung thugs kyi
NK016(ma)003:302: dngos grub sgrub pa'i gnas 'di lta bu'i bka' zab
NK016(ma)003:303: mo 'di thos par yang dka' na /
NK016(ma)003:305: rtogs pa lta smos kyang ci dgos /
NK016(ma)003:306: 'di lta bu'i bka' zab mo 'di ni bskal pa
NK016(ma)003:307: dpag tu med pa'i sngon rol nas sbyangs sbyangs pa'i
NK016(ma)003:308: las 'phro dang / skal bar ldan pa 'ga' dang 'ag'i spyod yul yin gyi /
NK016(ma)003:309: gang rung rung kun gyi thun mong ni ma yin no //
NK016(ma)003:310: de lta bu'i sgor zhugs pa'i rnal 'byor pa la
NK016(ma)003:311: nyams chag dang rtog sgrib sbyong ba'i thabs med pa
NK016(ma)003:314: nyan thos kyi theg pa ltar 'dul khrims nyams par gyur na /
NK016(ma)003:315: rdza be'u chag pa bzhin slar gso ba'i thabs med pa ni ma yin gyi /
NK016(ma)003:316: gsang sngags kyi bka' gser dang 'dra ba 'di'i sgor
NK016(ma)003:317: zhugs pa'i rnal 'byor pho mo nyams chag byung ba
NK016(ma)003:318: rnams sbyang ba'i thabs yod de /
NK016(ma)003:319: thugs yang dag pa'i bka' gsang ba 'di'i nyams chag byung na gser dngul zhom pa dang 'dra ste /
NK016(ma)003:320: slar gso ba'i thabs ni yod do //
NK016(ma)003:321: de'i thabs ni ji lta bu zhe na /
NK016(ma)003:322: rnal 'byor gyi spyi khrus ngan song dong sprugs zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
NK016(ma)003:323: de nas phyogs bcu nas lhags pa'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rnams kyis /
NK016(ma)003:324: bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces gsol to //
NK016(ma)003:329: zhes lus kyi yan lag lnga sa la brdabs te /
NK016(ma)003:330: brkyang phyag lan stong du btsal nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
NK016(ma)003:331: dpal kun tu bzang po rnal 'byor pho mo'i nyams
NK016(ma)003:332: chag dag par byed pa'i spyi khrus zhes bya ba
NK016(ma)003:333: 'gro ba yongs la phan 'dogs pa'i man ngag ngan
NK016(ma)003:334: song dong sprugs zhes bya ba bka' gsang ba las
NK016(ma)003:335: kyang shin tu ches gsang ba bdag cag rnams la
NK016(ma)003:336: bstan du gsol // zhes gsol ba dang /
NK016(ma)003:337: de nas ston pa kun tu bzang pos rnal 'byor pa rnams la bka' stsal pa /
NK016(ma)003:338: bsnyen sgrub rnam pa bzhi'i sgor zhugs pa'i rnal 'byor
NK016(ma)003:339: pho mo rnams la spyir dam tshig gi bsrung mtshams
NK016(ma)003:340: bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhig bzhugs na /
NK016(ma)003:341: de dag kun kyang rtsa ba'i dam tshig gsum du 'dus so //
NK016(ma)003:342: de yang lus ngag yid gsum du 'dus te /
NK016(ma)003:343: lus ngag yid gsum gyi sgo nas nyams chag byung ba ni /
NK016(ma)003:344: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs kyi thugs rje'i byin rlabs kyis sbyong ba'i thabs ni bzhugs so //
NK016(ma)003:345: yid kyi sgo nas nyams chag byung na /
NK016(ma)003:346: thugs kyi lta bas bskangs ste /
NK016(ma)003:347: rnal 'byor gyi gral 'dir 'khod pa rnams kyi yid
NK016(ma)003:348: dam sems ni don dam par thugs yang dag pa'i
NK016(ma)003:350: yang dag pa'i ye shes ni rang gi kun gzhi byang chub kyi sems yin te /
NK016(ma)003:351: kun gzhi ma bcos pa la yid rang byung gi
NK016(ma)003:352: ye shes bde ba chen por shar ba ni bsrung
NK016(ma)003:353: du med pa'i dam tshig chen po ste /
NK016(ma)003:354: kun gzhi de ltar yin phan chad kun gzhi bag
NK016(ma)003:355: chags dang bcas pas bskyed pa'i phung po dang dbang
NK016(ma)003:356: po dang / rnam par shes par bcas pa yang
NK016(ma)003:357: ma byung ma skyes pa ye nas rang byung chen
NK016(ma)003:358: po dang / po yin te / de ltar rtogs
NK016(ma)003:359: na rdo rje slob dpon dang mched dang lcam dral
NK016(ma)003:360: yang ye nas ma byung ma skyes pa yin te
NK016(ma)003:361: po dang / po yin te / / sku'i dam tshig nyams chag skongs so //
NK016(ma)003:364: rnam par shes pa yang ma byung ma skyes phan chad des brjod par bya ba'i bzlas brjod dang /
NK016(ma)003:366: sku phyag rgyar bsgom par bya ba yang ye nas ma byung ma skyes pa ste /
NK016(ma)003:367: gleng brjod dang rtsol sgrub kyi mtha' yas 'das pas /
NK016(ma)003:368: gsung gi dam tshig nyams chag skongs so //
NK016(ma)003:369: de lta bu'i ye nas ma byung ma skyes pa'i don de lta bu 'di ni /
NK016(ma)003:370: kun gyis ma rtogs shing rtogs par dka' bas /
NK016(ma)003:371: rang bzhin gyis gsang ba chen po yin pas /
NK016(ma)003:372: thugs kyi dam tshig nyams chag skongs so //
NK016(ma)003:373: de ltar rtsa ba'i nyams chag gsum bskangs phan chad /
NK016(ma)003:374: yan lag gi dam tshig thams cad kyang ye nas ma byung ma skyes pas /
NK016(ma)003:375: yan lag gi dam tshig thams cad kyi nyams chag skongs so //
NK016(ma)003:376: de ltar rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams ni mi bsrung ba'i bsrung pa chen po ste /
NK016(ma)003:377: de'i phyir na lus ngag yid gsum gyi sgo nas
NK016(ma)003:378: nyams chag byung ba rnams sku gsung thugs kyi thugs
NK016(ma)003:379: rjes skongs so // de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang /
NK016(ma)003:380: de nas phyogs bcu nas lhags pa'i rnal 'byor pho
NK016(ma)003:381: mo rnams kyis ston pa kun tu bzang po la
NK016(ma)003:383: e ma ho ngo mtshar che'o //
NK016(ma)003:384: ston pa kun tu bzang po bsrung du med pa'i
NK016(ma)003:385: bsrung ba chen po bka' stsal ba ngo mtshar che'o
NK016(ma)003:387: zhes lus kyi yan lag lnga sa la brdeb cing brkyang phyag btsal lo //
NK016(ma)003:388: de nas yang ston pa kun tu bzang po la
NK016(ma)003:389: bcom ldan 'das rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis 'di
NK016(ma)003:391: ston pa kun tu bzang po de lta bu'i ye nas ma byung ma skyes pa de /
NK016(ma)003:392: gdod ma nas rang shes rig pa'i rgyal po rang
NK016(ma)003:393: gis rang gsal bar shar ba rtogs pa rnams la
NK016(ma)003:395: nyams chag bskang du yang med na /
NK016(ma)003:396: de lta bu'i don ni ma rtogs par /
NK016(ma)003:397: gsang sngags kyi sgor zhugs so 'tshal gyi rnal 'byor pa dang /
NK016(ma)003:398: rnal 'byor ma la las gsang sngags don kyi man ngag ni ma go ste /
NK016(ma)003:399: la las ni tshogs kyi spyang ki byed /
NK016(ma)003:400: la las ni g.yo sgyu dang gsog 'jog byed /
NK016(ma)003:401: la las ni de bzhin bshegs pa'i bka' la ras
NK016(ma)003:402: chod byed pa rnams kyi don du nyams chag byung
NK016(ma)003:403: na bskang zhing bshags pa'i thabs ni ci mchis /
NK016(ma)003:404: de dag la thugs rjes gzung ba'i thabs shig bstan du gsol zhes zhus pa las /
NK016(ma)003:405: ston pa kun tu bzang pos 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
NK016(ma)003:406: rnal 'byor pa lta ba dman zhing shes rab zhan
NK016(ma)003:407: pa rnams kyi don du nyams chag bskang zhing bshags
NK016(ma)003:409: de'i thabs ni rdo rje slob dpon dang /
NK016(ma)003:411: sgyu 'phrul zhi khro rab 'byams kyi dkyil 'khor dang /
NK016(ma)003:412: grub pa'i sa la bzhugs pa'i rig 'dzin pho mo
NK016(ma)003:413: rnams mdun gyi nam mkha' la mngon sum du dmigs
NK016(ma)003:414: te / mtshan nas brjod de lus sa la brdab
NK016(ma)003:415: cing brkyang phyag 'tshal na 'byang ba'i thabs yin no
NK016(ma)003:416: te / // de lta bas na nga'i gsang sngags
NK016(ma)003:417: spyad nyes pa'i dbang gis ngan song gsum du ltung
NK016(ma)003:418: bar dogs pa rnams kyi ched du /
NK016(ma)003:419: 'gyod tshangs kyi bshags pa mdo tsam zhig bstan gyi khyed cag rnams kyis lus gcer bur phyungs te /
NK016(ma)003:420: chas rab tu gyis la yan lag lnga sa la brdeb cing brkyang phyag 'tshol cig /
NK016(ma)003:421: de nas phyogs bcu nas lhags pa'i rnal 'byor pho mo rnams kyis chas rab tu byas te /
NK016(ma)003:422: ston pa kun tu bzang po ltar mnyan pa dang /
NK016(ma)003:423: de nas ston pa kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal pa /
NK016(ma)003:424: ho klong chen po stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
NK016(ma)003:425: 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni don dam par chos
NK016(ma)003:428: rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa na
NK016(ma)003:429: bzhugs pa'i bde bar gshegs pa 'khor rgyal ba rgya
NK016(ma)003:430: mtsho dang bcas pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:432: kun gzhi gsang ba dag pa'i dbyings nas yid rang
NK016(ma)003:433: byung gi ye shes rang shes rig gi rgyal po
NK016(ma)003:434: yid byed pa po dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams
NK016(ma)003:435: cad kyi yab / chags med skyon dang bral bas gdan pad+ma la bzhugs pa /
NK016(ma)003:436: sangs rgyas dang sems can mnyam par mkhyen pas phyag mnyam pa'i phyag rgya can /
NK016(ma)003:437: dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi mnga' bdag /
NK016(ma)003:438: bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:440: 'di ltar snang ba'i chos thams cad don dam par
NK016(ma)003:441: chos kyi dbyings su sdud ma chos can mtshan ma'i
NK016(ma)003:442: skyon gyis ma gos pas gdan pad ma la bzhugs
NK016(ma)003:443: pa / kun la khyab par gnas pas phyag mnyam pa'i phyag rgya can /
NK016(ma)003:444: chos bya ba mo dkyil 'khor thams cad skyed pa'i gzhi /
NK016(ma)003:445: yum kun tu bzang mo la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:447: chos rnams rnam dag ye nas lhun grub pas //
NK016(ma)003:448: bya ba byed dang yid chos rnam par dag /
NK016(ma)003:449: nam mkha'i mtha' bzhin kun la snyoms mdzad pa //
NK016(ma)003:450: kun bzang yab yum gnyis la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:451: don dam par sems can gyi rnam par shes pa'i phung po gnas su dag pa /
NK016(ma)003:452: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi bdag nyid /
NK016(ma)003:453: mi 'jigs pa seng ge'i khri can /
NK016(ma)003:454: stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis skye shi dang
NK016(ma)003:455: 'pho 'gyur gyi rtog pa mi mnga' bas phyag rgya
NK016(ma)003:456: rdo rje can / bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje mi bskyod pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:457: don dam par sems can gyi gzugs kyi phung po gnas su dag pa /
NK016(ma)003:458: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i bdag nyid /
NK016(ma)003:459: stobs glang po che'i khri can /
NK016(ma)003:460: me long lta bu'i ye shes kyis kun la dbang bsgyur bas phyag rgya 'khor lo can /
NK016(ma)003:461: bcom ldan 'das dpal rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:462: don dam par sems can gyi tshor ba'i phung po gnas su dag pa /
NK016(ma)003:463: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan gyi bdag nyid /
NK016(ma)003:465: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes las ma g.yos par che ba'i yon tan thams cad 'byung bas /
NK016(ma)003:466: phyag rgya rin po che 'bar ba can /
NK016(ma)003:467: bcom ldan 'das dpal rin chen 'byung ldan la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:468: don dam par sems can gyi 'du shes kyi phung po gnas su dag pa /
NK016(ma)003:469: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi bdag nyid /
NK016(ma)003:470: mdzes byed rma bya'i khri can /
NK016(ma)003:471: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyis chos spyi dang
NK016(ma)003:472: rang gi mtshan nyid gsal la ma chags pas phyag
NK016(ma)003:473: rgya pad+ma can / bcom ldan 'das dpal snang pa mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:474: don dam par sems can gyi 'du byed kyi phung po gnas su dag pa /
NK016(ma)003:475: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las kyi bdag nyid /
NK016(ma)003:476: cang byed shang shang te'u'i khri can /
NK016(ma)003:477: bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyis phrin las mthar phyin pas phyag rgya rdo rje rgya gram can /
NK016(ma)003:478: bcom ldan 'das dpal don yod grub pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:479: chos sku nam mkha' bzhin du dbyer med kyang //
NK016(ma)003:480: gzugs sku 'ja' tshon bzhin du so sor gsal //
NK016(ma)003:481: thabs dang shes rab mchog la mnga' brnyes pa'i //
NK016(ma)003:482: rigs lnga bde bar gshegs la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:483: don dam par 'byung ba nam mkha'i ngo bo gnas su dag pa /
NK016(ma)003:484: yum chen mo kun tu bzang mo /
NK016(ma)003:485: dus gsum gyi rgyal ba thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas /
NK016(ma)003:486: yum chen mo nam mkha'i dbyings phyug ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:487: don dam par 'byung ba sa'i ngo bo gnas su dag pa /
NK016(ma)003:488: yum chen mo sangs rgyas spyan ma /
NK016(ma)003:489: dus gsum gyi rgyal ba thams cad skyed pa'i gzhi /
NK016(ma)003:490: yum chen mo rdo rje dbyings phyug ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:491: don dam par 'byung ba chu'i ngo bo gnas su dag pa /
NK016(ma)003:492: yum chen mo m+aa ma k+ai /
NK016(ma)003:493: dus gsum gyi rgyal ba thams cad kyi yon tan gyi gter 'dzin ma /
NK016(ma)003:494: yum chen mo rin chen dbyings phyug ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:495: don dam par 'byung ba me'i ngo bo gnas su dag pa /
NK016(ma)003:496: yum chen mo na bza' dkar mo /
NK016(ma)003:497: dus gsum gyi rgyal ba rnams kyi gsung mchog ma /
NK016(ma)003:498: yum chen mo pad+ma dbyings phyug ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:499: don dam par 'byung ba rlung gi ngo bo gnas su dag pa /
NK016(ma)003:500: yum chen mo dam tshig sgrol ma /
NK016(ma)003:501: 'gro ba rnams 'phags pa'i sa bcur sgrol ma /
NK016(ma)003:502: yum chen mo las kyi dbyings phyug ma la phyag 'phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:503: ngo mtshar pho brang bde bar gshegs pa'i yum //
NK016(ma)003:504: dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad skyed mdzad ma //
NK016(ma)003:505: rigs kyi yum gyur rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:506: don dam par sems can gyi mig gi rnam par shes pa gnas su dag pa /
NK016(ma)003:507: byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po /
NK016(ma)003:508: 'gro ba rnams bla na med pa'i gnas su skyed
NK016(ma)003:509: par byed pas phyag rgya rin po che'i myu gu
NK016(ma)003:510: can / shar phyogs na bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:511: don dam par sems can gyi rna ba'i rnam par shes pa gnas su dag pa /
NK016(ma)003:512: byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po /
NK016(ma)003:513: nyon mongs pa'i skye rgyun gcod pas phyag rgya ral gri can /
NK016(ma)003:514: lho phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:515: don dam par sems can gyi sna'i rnam par shes pa gnas su dag pa /
NK016(ma)003:516: byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug /
NK016(ma)003:517: nyon mongs pa'i skyon gyis ma gos pas phyag rgya pad+ma can /
NK016(ma)003:518: nub phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:519: don dam par sems can gyi lce'i rnam par shes pa gnas su dag pa /
NK016(ma)003:520: byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje /
NK016(ma)003:521: nyon mongs pa thams cad 'joms par byed pas phyag rgya rdo rje can /
NK016(ma)003:522: byang phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:523: don dam par sems can gyi mig gi dbang po gnas su dag pa /
NK016(ma)003:524: byang chub sems dpa' byams pa /
NK016(ma)003:525: nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba las rnam par rgyal pa phyag rgya klu shing mgo lcogs can /
NK016(ma)003:526: shar lho mtshams kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:527: don dam par sems can gyi rna ba'i dbang po gnas su dag pa /
NK016(ma)003:528: byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa rnam par sel ba /
NK016(ma)003:529: nyon mongs pa chos nyid du mkhyen pas phyag rgya glegs bam po ti can /
NK016(ma)003:530: lho nub mtshams kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:531: don dam par sems can gyii sna'i dbang po gnas su dag pa /
NK016(ma)003:532: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po /
NK016(ma)003:533: nyon mongs pa gnas su dag pa las dgos 'dod
NK016(ma)003:534: re ba yid bzhin du skong bas phyag rgya rin
NK016(ma)003:536: nub byang mtshams kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:537: don dam par sems can gyi lce'i dbang po gnas su dag pa /
NK016(ma)003:539: nyon mongs pa'i zug rngu mi mnga' bar shin tu mdzes pas phyag rgya me tog ut+pala can /
NK016(ma)003:540: byang shar mtshams kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:541: rnam shes dbang po dag pa'i sku gsung thugs //
NK016(ma)003:542: bde bar gshegs pa kun gyi sras mchog ste //
NK016(ma)003:543: sems dpa' chen po brgyad la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:544: don dam par sems can gyi mig gi yul gzugs su snang ba gnas su dag pa /
NK016(ma)003:546: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod pas mnyes par
NK016(ma)003:547: byed pa las mi 'gyur bas phyag rgya rdo rje
NK016(ma)003:548: khu tshur can / rdo rje sgeg mo ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:549: don dam par sems can gyi sna'i yul drir snom pa gnas su dag pa /
NK016(ma)003:551: mchod pa rgyun mi chad par byed pas phyag rgya rin po che'i phreng ba can /
NK016(ma)003:552: rdo rje phreng ba ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:553: don dam par sems can gyi rna ba'i yul sgrar grags pa gnas su dag pa /
NK016(ma)003:555: sgra'i mchod pas mnyes par byed bas phyag rgya pi wang can /
NK016(ma)003:556: rdo rje sgra dbyangs ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:557: don dam par sems can gyi lce'i yul ror bro ba gnas su dag pa /
NK016(ma)003:559: phyag rgya'i mchod pas mnyes par byed pas phyag rgya gar bsgyur can /
NK016(ma)003:560: rdo rje gar bsgyur ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:561: sgeg mo phreng thogs rin chen glu gar can //
NK016(ma)003:562: nam mkha' mnyam pa'i mchod pas rgyal ba mchod //
NK016(ma)003:563: byang chub lha mo'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:564: don dam par sems can gyi dus 'das pa zhes bya ba gnas su dag pa /
NK016(ma)003:566: spyan gyi mchod pas mnyes par byed pas phyag rgya me tog can /
NK016(ma)003:567: rdo rje me tog ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:568: don dam par sems can kyi dus da lta ba zhes bya ba gnas su dag pa /
NK016(ma)003:570: shangs kyi mchod pas mnyes par byed pas phyag rgya bdug spos can /
NK016(ma)003:571: rdo rje spos me ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:572: don dam par sems can gyi dus ma 'ongs pa zhes bya ba gnas su dag pa /
NK016(ma)003:574: sku'i mchod pas mnyes par byed pas phyag rgya mar me can /
NK016(ma)003:575: rdo rje mar me ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:576: don dam par sems can gyi dus phyis 'byung bar
NK016(ma)003:577: ma nges pa zhes bya ba gnas su dag pa
NK016(ma)003:579: ljags byug pa'i mchod pas mnyes par byed pas phyag rgya byug pa can //
NK016(ma)003:580: rdo rje dri chab ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:581: bdug pa me tog mar me dri chab ma //
NK016(ma)003:582: rgyal ba rgyal mtsho rnams la mchod 'bul ma //
NK016(ma)003:583: mchod pa'i lha mo rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:584: don dam par sems can gyi lus kyi reg pa gnas su dag pa /
NK016(ma)003:585: khro bo chen po gshin rje'i gshed po ste /
NK016(ma)003:586: byams pa chen pos 'gro ba'i don tshar gcod par mdzad pas phyag rgya n+ri mgo gdengs pa can /
NK016(ma)003:587: shar sgo'i bdag po la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:588: don dam par sems can gyi lus kyi dbang po gnas su dag pa /
NK016(ma)003:589: khro bo chen po stobs po che ste /
NK016(ma)003:590: snying rje chen pos 'gro ba'i don dug lnga ye
NK016(ma)003:591: shes lngas 'joms par mdzad pas phyag rgya rdo rje
NK016(ma)003:592: rtse lnga can / lho sgo'i bdag po la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:593: don dam par sems can gyi lus kyi reg bya gnas su dag /
NK016(ma)003:594: khro bo chen po rta mgrin te //
NK016(ma)003:595: dga' ba chen pos 'gro ba'i don mdzad pas phyag rgya thod dbyug sbrul gyis dkris pa can /
NK016(ma)003:596: nub sgo'i bdag po la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:597: don dam par sems can gyi lus kyi reg shes gnas su dag pa /
NK016(ma)003:598: khro bo chen po bdud rtsi 'khyil ba ste /
NK016(ma)003:599: btang snyoms chen pos 'gro ba'i don mthar phyin par mdzad pas phyag rgya rdo rje rgya gram can /
NK016(ma)003:600: byang sgo'i bdag po la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:601: drug shul thabs kyis 'gro ba 'dul mdzad pa //
NK016(ma)003:602: tshad med bzhi ldan sgo bzhi thub par srung //
NK016(ma)003:603: ta krita sgo ba bzhi la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:604: don dam par sems can gyi rtag par lta ba gnas su dag pa /
NK016(ma)003:606: 'khor ba'i nyon mongs pa thugs rjes 'dzin par byed pas phyag rgya lcags kyu can /
NK016(ma)003:607: rdo rje lcags kyu ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:608: don dam par sems can gyi chad par lta ba gnas su dag pa /
NK016(ma)003:610: 'khor ba'i nyon mongs pa thugs rjes 'dren par byed pas phyag rgya zhags pa can /
NK016(ma)003:611: rdo rje zhags pa ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:612: don dam par sems can gyi bdag tu lta ba gnas su dag pa /
NK016(ma)003:614: 'khor ba'i nyon mongs pa thugs rjes mi 'chor bar mdzad pas phyag rgya lcags sgrog can /
NK016(ma)003:615: rdo rje lcags sgrog ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:616: don dam par sems can gyi mtshan mar lta ba gnas su dag pa /
NK016(ma)003:618: 'khor ba'i nyon mongs pa thugs rjes thal bar rlog par mdzad pas phyag rgya dril bu can /
NK016(ma)003:619: rdo rje dril bu ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:620: rtag chad mthar phyin gsang ba yum gyi ngang //
NK016(ma)003:621: lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril 'khrol ma //
NK016(ma)003:622: sgo ma chen mo bzhi la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:623: don dam par sems can gyi lha'i 'jig rten du lta ba gnas su dag pa /
NK016(ma)003:625: nyon mongs pa nga rgyal gnas su dag par mdzad pas phyag rgya pi wang can /
NK016(ma)003:626: lha'i bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:627: don dam par sems can gyi lha ma yin gyi 'jig rten du lta ba gnas su dag pa /
NK016(ma)003:628: lha ma yin gyi thub pa ste /
NK016(ma)003:629: nyon mongs pa phrag dog gnas su dag par mdzad pas phyag rgya go cha can /
NK016(ma)003:630: lha ma yin gyi bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:631: don dam par sems can gyi mi'i 'jig rten du lta ba gnas du dag pa /
NK016(ma)003:633: nyon mongs pa 'dod chags gnas su dag par mdzad pas phyag rgya gseg shang par bu can /
NK016(ma)003:634: mi'i bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:635: don dam par sems can gyi byol song gi 'jig rten du lta ba gnas su dag pa /
NK016(ma)003:636: byol song gi thub pa ste /
NK016(ma)003:637: nyon mongs pa gti mug gnas su dag par mdzad pas phyag rgya glegs bam po ti can /
NK016(ma)003:638: byol song gi bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:639: don dam par sems can gyi yi dwags kyi 'jig rten du lta ba gnas su dag pa /
NK016(ma)003:640: yi dwags kyi thub pa ste /
NK016(ma)003:641: nyon mongs pa ser sna gnas su dag par mdzad pas phyag rgya rin po che'i sgrom bu can /
NK016(ma)003:642: yi dwags kyi bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:643: don dam par sems can gyi dmyal ba'i 'jig rten du lta ba gnas su dag pa /
NK016(ma)003:645: nyom mongs zhe sdang gnas su dag par mdzad pas phyag rgya me chu can /
NK016(ma)003:646: dmyal ba'i bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:647: steng 'og phyogs bzhi 'jig rten 'dul ba'i mgon //
NK016(ma)003:648: nyon mongs drug 'joms rgyud drug dag par sbyang //
NK016(ma)003:649: bcom ldan thub pa drug la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:650: ho sgyu 'phrul rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:652: rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor 'di ltar snang ba thams cad la yang phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:654: rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor rdul gcig
NK016(ma)003:655: gi steng na rdul snyed kyi dkyil 'khor bsam gyis
NK016(ma)003:656: mi khyab cing / brjod kyis mi lang ba'i lha
NK016(ma)003:657: rnams la rnal 'byor pa bdag cag gis lus rdul
NK016(ma)003:658: snyed du sprul nas lus ngag yid gsum shin tu
NK016(ma)003:659: gnong 'gyod dang bcas pas phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:661: gal te rnal 'byor pa gang zhig gis dkyil 'khor
NK016(ma)003:662: gyi lha de rnams kyi mtshan rna bar lan gcig
NK016(ma)003:663: thos pa tsam gyis kyang dmyal ba chen por mi
NK016(ma)003:664: ltung ngo // de bas na gus pas phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:666: gang zhig gus pas phyag 'tshal na //
NK016(ma)003:668: dam tshig bskangs nas dngos grub 'thob //
NK016(ma)003:669: de skad ces ston pa kun tu bzang pos bka' rtsal ba dang /
NK016(ma)003:670: phyogs bcu nas lhags pa'i rnal 'byor pho mo rnams kyis /
NK016(ma)003:672: zhes brjod cing lus sa la brdeb cing brkyang phyag
NK016(ma)003:673: lan stong du btsal bas rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi
NK016(ma)003:674: nyams chag bskangs nas phyag rgya chen po'i rig 'dzin
NK016(ma)003:675: gyi sa la bsnyen par gyur to //
NK016(ma)003:676: rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis kyang nyams chag bskangs nas /
NK016(ma)003:677: sor chud pa'i rig 'a dzin gyi sa la khad kyis bsnyen par gyur to //
NK016(ma)003:678: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
NK016(ma)003:679: rnal 'byor gyi gral 'dir 'dus pa'i ston pa rdo rje slob dpon gyi bka' drin gyis /
NK016(ma)003:682: mar me gcig la blta ba'i rdo rje spun grogs rnams nyon cig /
NK016(ma)003:683: sgyu 'phrul khro bo'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba /
NK016(ma)003:684: thugs zhi ba chen po chos nyid kyi ngang las
NK016(ma)003:685: ma g.yos par sku thugs rje rol pa chen po
NK016(ma)003:687: phrin las rnam pa bzhis 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa
NK016(ma)003:688: rnams la yang phyag 'tshal zhing nyams chag skongs shig
NK016(ma)003:689: / de nas rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis ston pa kun tu bzang po la gsol pa /
NK016(ma)003:690: rol pa chen po khro bo'i dkyil 'khor de'i mtshan rnams bdag cag rnams la bstan du gsol /
NK016(ma)003:693: de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos mtshan nas brjod de bka' stsal pa /
NK016(ma)003:695: rang rig pa thabs kyi rgyal po khro bo thams cad kyi rje btsan chen po /
NK016(ma)003:696: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyi dpal /
NK016(ma)003:697: bcom ldan 'das bla na med pa'i dpal chen po /
NK016(ma)003:698: che mchog he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:699: rdo rje lta bu'i sku dus gsum du 'gyur ba mi mnga' zhing /
NK016(ma)003:700: zhe sdang chen po'i thabs la mkhas pas dregs pa pho mo'i gdan la bzhugs pa /
NK016(ma)003:701: khro bo thams cad kyi thugs kyi bdag nyid /
NK016(ma)003:702: badz+ra he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:703: chos nyid stong pa nyid kyi dbyings nas skye ba med pa'i sku brnyes pa /
NK016(ma)003:704: gti mug chen po'i thabs la mkhas pas ma h+aa de wa'i gdan la bzhugs pa /
NK016(ma)003:705: khro bo thams cad kyi sku'i bdag nyid /
NK016(ma)003:706: bud+d+ha he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:707: chos nyid byang chub sems kyis longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku brnyes pa /
NK016(ma)003:708: nga rgyal chen po'i thabs la mkhas pas gshin rje'i gdan la bzhugs pa /
NK016(ma)003:709: khro bo thams cad kyi yon tan gyi bdag nyid /
NK016(ma)003:710: rat+na he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:711: chos nyid chags pa med pa'i dbyings nas byang chub sems dpa'i sku brnyes pa /
NK016(ma)003:712: 'dod chags chen po'i thabs la mkhas pas klu'i gdan la gzhugs pa /
NK016(ma)003:713: khro bo thams cad kyi gsung gi bdag nyid /
NK016(ma)003:714: pad+ma he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:715: phrin las grub pa'i dbyings nas sprul pa mchog gi sku brnyes pa /
NK016(ma)003:716: phrag dog chen po'i thabs la mkhas pas gnod sbyin gyi gdan la bzhugs pa /
NK016(ma)003:717: khro bo thams cad kyi phrin las kyi bdag nyid /
NK016(ma)003:718: karma he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:719: sbyor ba'i dbyings nas phyin ci log gi lta ba 'joms pa'i sku brnyes pa /
NK016(ma)003:720: ga na'i thabs la mkhas pas drang srong gi gdan la bzhugs pa /
NK016(ma)003:721: rak+sha he ru ka la phyag 'dzal lo //
NK016(ma)003:722: dam tshig gi dbyings nas myong byed kyi rtog pa 'joms pa'i sku brnyes pa /
NK016(ma)003:723: nyams pa bskang ba'i thabs la mkhas pas srin po'i gdan la bzhugs pa /
NK016(ma)003:724: sa nu he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:725: gsang ba'i dbyings nas skye gnas kyi rtog pa 'joms pa'i sku brnyes pa /
NK016(ma)003:726: mtshan ma'i thabs la mkhas pas rlung lha'i gdan la bzhugs pa /
NK016(ma)003:727: gu h+ya he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:728: sgrol ba'i dbyings nas reg bya'i rtog pa 'joms pa'i sku brnyes pa /
NK016(ma)003:729: ta na'i thabs la mkhas pas bgegs kyi gdan la bzhugs pa /
NK016(ma)003:730: yak+sha he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:731: 'jig rten 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba //
NK016(ma)003:732: gdug pa 'dul phyir dus las mi 'da' ba'i //
NK016(ma)003:733: he ru ka dpal rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:734: rang bzhin dag pa'i dbyings nas yum chen khro mo'i sku brnyes pa /
NK016(ma)003:735: sku dpal du 'bar bas rngams pa'i cha lugs can /
NK016(ma)003:736: gsung dpal du 'bar bas rngams pa'i gdangs skad can /
NK016(ma)003:737: thugs dpal du 'bar bas thugs rje chen po can /
NK016(ma)003:738: dpal 'bar khros ma'i rgyal mo che /
NK016(ma)003:739: khro mo chen mo gnam zhal dbyings phyug ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:740: chos nyid dbyings kyi phyag rgya las /
NK016(ma)003:741: rnam par thar ba'i sku brnyes pa /
NK016(ma)003:742: thabs dang shes rab 'du 'bral med par 'khril bas cha lugs gtso mo dang mthun pa /
NK016(ma)003:743: badz+ra kro d+h+ai shwa r+ai ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:744: mnyam nyid blang dor med pa'i dbyings nas rol pa ye shes kyi sku brnyes pa /
NK016(ma)003:745: thabs dang shes rab 'du 'bral med par 'khril bas cha lugs gtso mo dang mthun pa /
NK016(ma)003:746: bud+d+ha kro d+h+ai shwa r+ai ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:747: byams mgon chos nyid kyi dbyings nas thugs rje ye shes kyi sku brnyes pa /
NK016(ma)003:748: thabs dang shes rab 'du 'bral med par 'khril bas cha lugs gtso mo dang mthun pa /
NK016(ma)003:749: rat+na kro d+h+ai shwa r+ai ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:750: chos nyid pad+ma'i dbyings nas skyon bral pad+ma'i sku brnyes pa /
NK016(ma)003:751: thabs dang shes rab 'du 'bral med par 'khril bas cha lugs gtso mo dang mthun pa /
NK016(ma)003:752: pad+ma kro d+h+ai shwa r+ai ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:753: las rab rol ba'i dbyings nas don grub mchog gi sku brnyes pa /
NK016(ma)003:754: thabs dang shes rab 'du 'bral med par 'khril bas cha lugs gtso mo dang mthun pa /
NK016(ma)003:755: karma kro d+h+ai shwa r+ai ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:756: drod las skyes pa 'joms pa las sprul pa ste /
NK016(ma)003:757: rak+sha kro d+h+ai shwa r+ai ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:758: mngal las skyes pa 'joms pa las sprul pa ste /
NK016(ma)003:759: sa nu kro d+h+ai shwa r+ai ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:760: bardzusa nas skyes pa 'joms pa las sprul pa ste /
NK016(ma)003:761: gu h+ya kro d+h+ai shwa r+ai ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:762: sgo nga las skyes pa 'joms pa las sprul pa ste /
NK016(ma)003:763: yak+sha kro d+h+ai shwa r+ai ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:764: khro mo dbang phyug sku la 'khril mdzad cing //
NK016(ma)003:765: mkha' 'gro mi bzad 'bar ba'i sprin 'phro ma //
NK016(ma)003:766: gdug pa 'dul mdzad yum la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:767: khro mo sngon mo bam dbyug 'dzin //
NK016(ma)003:768: goo r+ai ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:769: khro bo ser mo mda' gzhu 'dzin //
NK016(ma)003:770: tsoo r+ai ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:771: khro mo dmar mo chu srin 'dzin //
NK016(ma)003:772: pra mo h+aa la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:773: khro mo mthing nag rdo rje 'dzin //
NK016(ma)003:774: bee ta l+ai la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:775: khro mo dmar ser byis rgyu 'dren //
NK016(ma)003:777: khro mo ljang gu dung khrag 'thung //
NK016(ma)003:778: g+ha sma r+ai la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:779: khro mo nag mo byis snying za //
NK016(ma)003:780: sma sha n+ai la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:781: khro mo ser skya mchog lus 'dral //
NK016(ma)003:783: bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba'i klong dkyil nas //
NK016(ma)003:784: ye shes sku mchog 'jigs byed gyad kyis bzhugs //
NK016(ma)003:785: khro mo chen mo brgyad la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:786: sing ha kha ro bsnol ser seng //
NK016(ma)003:787: seng ge'i dbu la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:788: b+y+aa g+h+ri mnan blta bsnol dmar stag /
NK016(ma)003:789: stag gi dbu la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:790: sri la nag mo byis ldag wa //
NK016(ma)003:791: wa yi dbu la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:792: shwa na 'dral blta mthing ga spyang //
NK016(ma)003:793: spyang mo'i dbu la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:794: g+h+rii d+ha gri dmar rgyu 'dren rgod //
NK016(ma)003:795: bya rgod dbu la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:796: kang+ka zhing phrag snar mgo ring //
NK016(ma)003:797: dur bya'i dbu la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:798: k+aa ka kha ro b+han gri nag /
NK016(ma)003:799: bya rog dbu la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:800: u l+au mthing ga rdo rgyu 'ug /
NK016(ma)003:802: nam mkha'i lus can gar yang thogs med cing //
NK016(ma)003:803: 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i gzugs can 'phrul mo che //
NK016(ma)003:804: phra men chen mo brgyad la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:805: sgo ma sngon mo lcags kyu 'dzin //
NK016(ma)003:806: rta gdong ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:807: sgo ma nag mo zhags pa 'dzin //
NK016(ma)003:808: phag gdong ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:809: sgo ma dmar mo lcags sgrog 'dzin //
NK016(ma)003:810: seng gdong ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:811: sgo ma ljang gu dril bu 'dzin //
NK016(ma)003:812: spyang gdong ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:813: rdo rje gdong mo pho nya mgyogs ma bzhi //
NK016(ma)003:814: shar lho nub byang sgo bzhi thub par srung //
NK016(ma)003:815: sgo skyong khro mo bzhi la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:816: chos nyid rnam dag ngang las cir yang snang /
NK016(ma)003:817: sna tshogs cir yang bsgyur ba'i sku mnga' zhing //
NK016(ma)003:818: srid gsum zhing du sbyor bas g.yang gzhi gsol //
NK016(ma)003:819: stong khams gnas spor nyi zer zhags pa 'phen //
NK016(ma)003:820: spor byed nyi zhags 'phen la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:821: rnam rtog nad rnams rtag tu bsal ba'i phyir //
NK016(ma)003:822: mi 'bral cir yang bsgyur ba'i sku mnga' zhing //
NK016(ma)003:823: nyon mongs lnga gzhom thod khrag mdung thung 'phen //
NK016(ma)003:824: thugs rje thabs mkhas mi rnams gnas su spor //
NK016(ma)003:825: spor byed mdung thung 'phen la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:826: ma rig sems can dbyings su gzud pa'i phyir //
NK016(ma)003:827: chos nyid bde ba'i sku las g.yos pa med //
NK016(ma)003:828: stong khams dbang sdud dung khrag thugs kar bskyil //
NK016(ma)003:829: brjid pa'i rol pas stong khams gnas su spor //
NK016(ma)003:830: spor byed dril 'khrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:831: thugs rje byams pas kun la khyab pa yi //
NK016(ma)003:832: mdog bzang dkar ser zhi rgyas ldan pa'i sku //
NK016(ma)003:833: 'dod lnga dbang sdud dung khrag thugs kar 'dzin //
NK016(ma)003:834: lha rnams gnas spor rdo rje khyung chen 'dzin //
NK016(ma)003:835: spor byed khyung thogs ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:836: sdug bsngal mi bzad yongs su gzhig pa'i phyir //
NK016(ma)003:837: mthing nag chen mo rngams pa'i sku mnga' zhing //
NK016(ma)003:838: g.yul chen rab bzlog rdo rje skar mda' 'phen //
NK016(ma)003:839: lha min gnas spor dug khrag zhal du gsol //
NK016(ma)003:840: spor byed skar mda' 'phen la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:841: log par lta ba dbang du mdzad pa'i phyir //
NK016(ma)003:842: sku mdog dmar nag dbang drag 'dzom pa'i zhal //
NK016(ma)003:843: phyi nang sgrib gnyis sbyangs nas bde ba'i phyir //
NK016(ma)003:844: rdo rje glog phreng yi dwags gnas su spor //
NK016(ma)003:845: spor byed glog phreng can la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:846: gti mug rmongs pa dbang du mdzad pa'i phyir //
NK016(ma)003:847: dkar nag phyed ma zhi drag ldan pa'i sku //
NK016(ma)003:848: gti mug stongs mdzad thod khrag zhal du gsol //
NK016(ma)003:849: byol song gnas su spor bas blak+sha rdeb //
NK016(ma)003:850: spor byed blak+sha rdeb la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:851: sdug bsngal brgyad dang bcu drug sbyang ba'i phyir //
NK016(ma)003:852: sku mdog ser nag drag po rgyas pa'i sku //
NK016(ma)003:853: dmyal ba stongs mdzad thod khrag zhal du gsol //
NK016(ma)003:854: dmyal ba gnas spor rdo rje ral gri 'dzin //
NK016(ma)003:855: spor byed ral gri 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:856: dbyings dang ye shes mnyam sbyor rol pa las //
NK016(ma)003:857: 'gro don mdzad pa'i thub pa chen po rnams //
NK016(ma)003:858: las ngan zhi bas 'dul bar mi 'gyur ba'i //
NK016(ma)003:859: rgyud drug rnams la dbang drag rol par mdzad //
NK016(ma)003:860: spor byed brgyad du mtshan gsol mi bzad ma //
NK016(ma)003:861: kun kyang 'jigs tshul che la snying rjer ldan //
NK016(ma)003:862: skam gsher spel ba'i gdan la brkyang bskum bzhugs //
NK016(ma)003:863: thod khrag mtshon cha 'dzin cing g.yang gzhi gyon //
NK016(ma)003:864: ral pa dbyings 'bar bshugs glus stong khams 'gengs //
NK016(ma)003:865: ha ha'i gad 'dengs rgyud drug sems can skyong //
NK016(ma)003:866: rgyud drug 'khor ba'i sems can ci 'dra ba //
NK016(ma)003:867: lha mchog khyed kyi spyan sngar sa le ba'i //
NK016(ma)003:868: 'gro ba rigs drug sems can kun sbyangs nas //
NK016(ma)003:869: lha mchog khyed kyis dngos grub stsal du gsol //
NK016(ma)003:871: g.yag mgo can la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:873: sbrul mgo can la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:875: gzig mgo can la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:877: sre mo'i mgo la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:879: pha wang mgo la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:881: dred mgo can la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:883: dom mgo can la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:885: chu srin mgo la phyag 'dzal lo //
NK016(ma)003:887: sdig pa'i mgo la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:889: khra mgo can la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:891: wa mgo can la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:893: stag mgo can la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:895: rgod mgo can la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:897: rta mgo can la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:899: khyung mgo can la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:901: khyi mgo can la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:903: pu shud mgo la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:905: shwa ba'i mgo la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:907: spyang mgo can la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:909: skyin mgo can la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:911: phag mgo can la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:913: khwa mgo can la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:915: ba lang mgo la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:917: sbrul mgo can la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:919: khu byug mgo la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:921: ra mgo can la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:922: rnal 'byor dmar mo lcags sgrog bsnams //
NK016(ma)003:923: seng mgo can la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:925: skya ka'i mgo la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:926: dpal gyi 'khor tshogs badz+ra a ra li //
NK016(ma)003:927: mkha' la shugs 'gro ma tshogs dbang phyug ma //
NK016(ma)003:928: rnal 'byor nyi shu brgyad la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:929: zhe sdang tshul gyis zhe sdang 'joms mdzad pa //
NK016(ma)003:930: rdo rje gzhon nu'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:931: 'dod chags tshul gyis 'dod chags 'joms mdzad pa //
NK016(ma)003:932: 'khor lo rgyas 'debs yum la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:933: 'dod pa'i skyon spang skye la dbang mdzad pa //
NK016(ma)003:934: khro chen h+aum k+aa ra la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:935: ma byin len spangs yo byad dbang mdzad pa //
NK016(ma)003:936: khro chen rnam par rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:937: srog gcod skyon spangs tshe la dbang mdzad pa //
NK016(ma)003:938: khro chen gshin rje'i gshed la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:939: phra ma'i skyon spangs chos la dbang mdzad pa //
NK016(ma)003:940: khro chen rta mchog dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:941: ngag rtsub skyon spangs las la dbang mdzad pa //
NK016(ma)003:942: khro chen bdud rtsi 'khyil la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:943: log par lta spangs ye shes dbang mdzad pa //
NK016(ma)003:944: khro chen dbyug sngon can la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:945: rdzun gyi skyon spangs mos la dbang mdzad pa //
NK016(ma)003:946: khro chen mi g.yo mgon la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:947: ngag 'khyal skyon spangs sems la dbang mdzad pa //
NK016(ma)003:948: khro chen 'dod pa'i rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:949: gnod sems skyon spangs rdzu 'phrul dbang mdzad pa //
NK016(ma)003:950: khro chen khams gsum rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:951: brnab sems skyon spangs smon lam dbang mdzad pa //
NK016(ma)003:952: khro chen stobs po che la 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:953: ye shes pha rol phyin ma ste //
NK016(ma)003:955: shes rab pha rol phyin ma ste //
NK016(ma)003:956: rdo rje snyems la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:957: tshul khrims pha rol phyin ma ste //
NK016(ma)003:958: rdo rje sder la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:959: bsam gtan pha rol phyin ma ste //
NK016(ma)003:960: dur khrod ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:961: thabs kyi pha rol phyin ma ste //
NK016(ma)003:962: gtun khung ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:963: brtson 'grus pha rol phyin ma ste //
NK016(ma)003:964: rab gtum ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:965: sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin ma ste //
NK016(ma)003:966: mda' snyems ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:967: smon lam pha rol phyin ma ste //
NK016(ma)003:968: skyod byed ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:969: stobs kyi pha rol phyin ma ste //
NK016(ma)003:970: gsod byed ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:971: bzod pa'i pha rol phyin ma ste //
NK016(ma)003:972: skul byed ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:973: phyogs bcu dregs pa snol ba'i gdan steng na //
NK016(ma)003:974: ye shes bskal pa me dpung 'bar ba'i klong //
NK016(ma)003:975: bdud 'dul yab yum rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:976: dmigs med chos kyi sku la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:977: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:978: cir yang sprul pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:979: mi 'gyur rdo rje'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:980: mngon par byang chub sku la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:981: dus gsum rgyal ba rnams kyis bsgrubs pa yi //
NK016(ma)003:982: tshogs gnyis rdzogs nas yon tan mthar phyin pa //
NK016(ma)003:983: sku dang ye shes tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:984: 'byung ba lnga las skur bzhengs ma //
NK016(ma)003:985: rtag rgyal lnga la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:986: rang bzhin dbyings las grub pa mo //
NK016(ma)003:987: dbyings phyug lnga la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:988: rgyu 'bras byang chub sems kyi sprul pa ste //
NK016(ma)003:989: mkha' 'gro sum cu gnyis la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:990: ga na pa ti'i sprul pa ste //
NK016(ma)003:991: king ka ra la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:992: lha mo dpal mo'i sprul pa ste //
NK016(ma)003:993: king ka r+ai la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:994: 'jig rten khams la dbang mdzad ma //
NK016(ma)003:996: 'dod pa'i ro la chags pa mo //
NK016(ma)003:997: ma mo'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:998: legs nyes stangs 'dzin dam tshig rjes gcod cing //
NK016(ma)003:999: bka' bzhin rjes su sgrub pa'i grogs mdzad ma //
NK016(ma)003:1000: dam can rgya mtsho'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK016(ma)003:1001: ston pa kun tu bzang po yis //
NK016(ma)003:1002: de skad ces ni bka' stsal pa //
NK016(ma)003:1003: gang gis sgyu 'phrul khro bo yi //
NK016(ma)003:1005: nyams chag kun kyang dag 'gyur te //
NK016(ma)003:1006: mtshams med lnga yi sdig kyang 'byang //
NK016(ma)003:1007: na rag ga nas kyang dong sprugs te //
NK016(ma)003:1008: rig 'dzin rgyal ba'i zhing du grags //
NK016(ma)003:1010: phyogs bcu nas lhags pa'i rnal 'byor pho mo rnams kyis //
NK016(ma)003:1012: bcom ldan 'das kyis rnal 'byor gyi spyi khrus kyi chos bshad pa ngo mtshar che'o //
NK016(ma)003:1014: lus sa la brdeb cing brkyang phyag lan stong du btsal lo //
NK016(ma)003:1015: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha de rnams kyi mtshan
NK016(ma)003:1016: rnal 'byor pho mo rnams kyis thos pa tsam gyis
NK016(ma)003:1017: rtsa ba dang yan lag gi dam tshig nyams chag
NK016(ma)003:1019: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang /
NK016(ma)003:1023: phrin las bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par gyur te /
NK016(ma)003:1024: yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen gyi sa la lhun gyis grub par gyur to //
NK016(ma)003:1025: de nas dus der dpal rdo rje sems dpa' zhes
NK016(ma)003:1026: bya ba dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams
NK016(ma)003:1027: cad kyi thugs rje ye shes kyi bdag nyid /
NK016(ma)003:1028: sku mtshan gyi me tog la dpe byad bzang po'i 'bras bus brgyan pa /
NK016(ma)003:1029: sangs rgyas kyi che ba'i yon tan stobs dang /
NK016(ma)003:1032: ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa mnga' ba /
NK016(ma)003:1033: gzhan yang dbu la rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas kyis dbang bskur ba /
NK016(ma)003:1036: rin po che dang rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa /
NK016(ma)003:1037: gdan yang byang chub sems dpa' brgyad glang po cher
NK016(ma)003:1038: sprul pa brgyad kyis rin po che'i khri btegs pa'i
NK016(ma)003:1039: steng na / pad+ma dang nyi zla brtsegs pa'i steng na sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du bzhugs pa /
NK016(ma)003:1040: sku blta bas chog mi shes pa ste /
NK016(ma)003:1045: me long nang gi gzugs brnyan ltar snang la rang bzhin med pa zhig /
NK016(ma)003:1046: 'og min chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang nas mngon
NK016(ma)003:1047: sum du byon te ston pa kun tu bzang po'i
NK016(ma)003:1048: spyan sngar 'dug nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
NK016(ma)003:1049: kye ston pa kun tu bzang po khyed kyis gsang
NK016(ma)003:1050: sngags kyi sgor zhugs pa thams cad kyi nyams chag
NK016(ma)003:1051: sor chud par bya ba'i ched du /
NK016(ma)003:1052: rnal 'byor gyi spyi khrus 'gyod tshangs kyi cho ga
NK016(ma)003:1053: bshad pa 'di ni rgyal ba sangs rgyas thams cad
NK016(ma)003:1054: kyi yum / rnal 'byor la sngar 'das pa rnams kyi lam chen po /
NK016(ma)003:1055: da ltar gyi rnal 'byor pa ma rig pa rnams kyi mig 'byed pa /
NK016(ma)003:1056: ma 'ongs pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi 'dren shul te /
NK016(ma)003:1057: rnal 'byor spyi'i lam chen po 'di lta bu bka' stsal pa /
NK016(ma)003:1058: thugs rje che la ngo mtshar che lags so //
NK016(ma)003:1059: de bas na bdag gis kyang yi ge brgya pa zhes bya ba /
NK016(ma)003:1060: bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi yang snying /
NK016(ma)003:1061: nyams chag dang rtog sgrib thams cad sel bar byed
NK016(ma)003:1062: pa 'di brjod kyi rnal 'byor pa nyams chag dang
NK016(ma)003:1064: bag chags ngan pa can khyed rnams nyon cig /
NK016(ma)003:1065: badz+ra sa t+wa sa ma ya /
NK016(ma)003:1067: badz+ra sa t+wa te no pa tish+tha /
NK016(ma)003:1070: a nu rak+to me b+ha wa /
NK016(ma)003:1071: su po sh+yo me b+ha wa /
NK016(ma)003:1075: ha ha ha ha hoh b+ha ga w+aan sarba ta th+aa ga ta badz+ra m+aa me muny+tsa /
NK016(ma)003:1077: ma h+aa sa ma ya sa t+wa a /
NK016(ma)003:1078: 'di dag dus gcig la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na /
NK016(ma)003:1079: nyams chag thams cad bskangs te ngan song gsum du ltung ba las thar bar 'gyur ro //
NK016(ma)003:1080: rnal 'byor pa gang zhig gis yi dam du bcas nas 'don na /
NK016(ma)003:1081: mi de tshe 'di la yang dus gsum gyi sangs
NK016(ma)003:1082: rgyas thams cad kyi sras kyi dam par dgongs nas
NK016(ma)003:1084: tshe 'phos nas kyang bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi
NK016(ma)003:1085: sras dam pa nyid du gdon mi za bar 'gyur
NK016(ma)003:1086: ro // de skad ces gsol pa dang /
NK016(ma)003:1087: phyogs cu nas lhags pa'i rnal 'byor pho mo rnams kyis /
NK016(ma)003:1088: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la brkyang phyag lan stong du btsal zhing 'di skad ces gsol to //
NK016(ma)003:1089: bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi yang snying /
NK016(ma)003:1090: nyams chag dang rtog sgrib thams cad sbyong bar byed
NK016(ma)003:1091: pa'i yi ge brgya pa bka' rtsal pa ngo mtshar
NK016(ma)003:1092: che lags so // a la la ho /
NK016(ma)003:1093: de nas dpal kun tu bzang pos /
NK016(ma)003:1094: rdo rje sems dpa' la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
NK016(ma)003:1095: rdo rje sems dpa' khyod kyis gsang sngags kyi sgor
NK016(ma)003:1096: zhugs pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams la phan gdags shing
NK016(ma)003:1097: / nyams chag dang rtog sgrib thams cad sbyong bar
NK016(ma)003:1098: byed pa yi ge brgya pa zhes bya ba bshags
NK016(ma)003:1099: pa thams cad kyi rgyal po brjod pa legs so
NK016(ma)003:1100: / legs so // de nas phyogs bcu nas lhags
NK016(ma)003:1101: pa'i rnal 'byor pho mo rnams kyis lus pus btsugs
NK016(ma)003:1102: / legs so // su bcas te / 'gyod tshangs su smras pa /
NK016(ma)003:1104: bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po dang /
NK016(ma)003:1105: rigs lnga'i bde bar gshegs pa la sogs pa /
NK016(ma)003:1106: sgyu 'phrul zhi khro'i lha tshogs rnams ni thugs rje
NK016(ma)003:1107: che la thabs mkhas pas kun la snyoms pa'i yab
NK016(ma)003:1108: yum lags / sngar 'das pa'i rig 'dzin gyi sa
NK016(ma)003:1109: la bzhugs pa rnams ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen lags
NK016(ma)003:1110: yum lags / na / bdag cag la sogs pa gsang sngags kyi sgor zhugs so 'tshal rnams kyis /
NK016(ma)003:1111: bde bar gshegs pa'i mdzad spyod dam pa klong du ma gyur cing /
NK016(ma)003:1112: dgongs spyod dam pa gdings su ma chud pa'i dbang
NK016(ma)003:1113: gis bka' gsang ba chen po spyad nyes par gyur
NK016(ma)003:1114: te / rtsa ba dang yan lag gi dam tshig las 'gongs shing 'das par gyur pas /
NK016(ma)003:1115: la las ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' ngo bo nyid kyis ma bcos pa la /
NK016(ma)003:1116: gzu lum dang ras gcod bgyis /
NK016(ma)003:1117: la las ni dam pa ston pa'i rdo rje slob dpon la snying nas smad pa dang /
NK016(ma)003:1119: thugs dang 'gal ba'i las mang po bgyis /
NK016(ma)003:1120: la las ni dam tshig gcig pa'i rdo rje spun grogs la /
NK016(ma)003:1126: ngan du smra ba la sogs pa sku'i dam tshig nyams pa'i las bgyis /
NK016(ma)003:1127: la las ni dang po rdo rje slob dpon gyis lung phog ste /
NK016(ma)003:1129: yi dam lha'i ting 'dzin ma gsal zhing /
NK016(ma)003:1130: sgom sgrub rngo ma thogs pa dang /
NK016(ma)003:1131: 'dzab dang bzlas brjod rgyun chad pa dang /
NK016(ma)003:1132: bsnyen sgrub zab mo dus las yol te /
NK016(ma)003:1133: lo zla 'das pa la sogs pa'i las bgyis /
NK016(ma)003:1134: la las ni bka' gsang ba zab mo'i lta spyod mngon du phyung zhing /
NK016(ma)003:1137: gsang bar gnyer gtad pa rnams gzhan la spel ba
NK016(ma)003:1138: la sogs pa sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig nyams
NK016(ma)003:1139: pa'i dbang gis lus ngag yid gsum 'tshig pa'i las
NK016(ma)003:1141: phyogs bcu'i sgyu 'phrul rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor dang /
NK016(ma)003:1142: grub pa'i sa la bzhugs pa'i rig 'dzin pho mo rnams dang /
NK016(ma)003:1143: ye shes dang las las grub pa legs nyes kyi stangs 'dzin cing /
NK016(ma)003:1144: dam tshig gi rjes gcod pa'i dam can rgya mtsho rnams la mchod pa 'di la brten nas /
NK016(ma)003:1145: 'gyod tshangs su gsol ba'i mdo ni /
NK016(ma)003:1146: sku'i dam tshig las 'das pa'i dbang gis /
NK016(ma)003:1147: 'jig rten 'dir yang lus la mdze shu la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal 'byung zhing /
NK016(ma)003:1148: tshe 'phos nas kyang dmyal ba chen po'i yang gting
NK016(ma)003:1149: thar ba'i dus med pa'i gnas su lus gshag gtub
NK016(ma)003:1150: la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi rgyu 'di lta bu
NK016(ma)003:1151: bsags pa rnams mthol zhing bshags so //
NK016(ma)003:1152: gsung gi dam tshig las 'das pa'i dbang gis /
NK016(ma)003:1153: 'jig rten 'di dang phyi ma'i ngag dig lkugs la
NK016(ma)003:1154: sogs pa ngag gi rgyu 'di lta bu bsags pa
NK016(ma)003:1156: thugs kyi dam tshig las 'das pa'i dbang gis /
NK016(ma)003:1157: 'jig rten 'di dang phyi ma'i sems smyo 'bog la sogs pa dang /
NK016(ma)003:1158: ngan song gi rgyu bas gas pa rnams mthol zhing bshags so //
NK016(ma)003:1159: la las ni dbang ma mnos par slob dpon gyi sa bzung nas /
NK016(ma)003:1160: bka' zab mo la dbang zos te bardzabasa pa dang /
NK016(ma)003:1161: la las ni gab pa'i man ngag ma rtogs par /
NK016(ma)003:1162: sbas pa'i gsang ba la mngon par 'chel te /
NK016(ma)003:1163: gsang sngags kyi spyod pa zab mo bab col du spyad pas /
NK016(ma)003:1164: khra dang spyang gi lta bu'i sdig las bgyis te /
NK016(ma)003:1165: dmyal ba mi bzad pa'i las bgyis pa rnams mthol zhing bshags so //
NK016(ma)003:1166: la las ni ye shes kyi lha dang /
NK016(ma)003:1167: rdo rje slob dpon gyi gsang ba'i dam tshig tshul bzhin du mnos pa las /
NK016(ma)003:1171: grogs zla la tshod yod pa dang /
NK016(ma)003:1172: rngam chos kyi phud dang 'phags pa la bsngosa pa la thug thub bgyis /
NK016(ma)003:1173: la las ni 'jig rten 'di'i skad cig yud tsam las ma rtogs pa /
NK016(ma)003:1175: grogs kyi ngo dga' dang btsan thabs dang dregs chos kyi las bgyis te /
NK016(ma)003:1176: gsang sngags kyi gzhung ma bsnyegs pa mthol zhing bshags so //
NK016(ma)003:1177: gzhan yang yan lag gi dam tshig nyi shu rtsa lnga las /
NK016(ma)003:1178: spyad par bya ba'i dam tshig lnga las 'das te /
NK016(ma)003:1179: ta na ga na gnyis dang /
NK016(ma)003:1180: ma byin par len pa dang /
NK016(ma)003:1182: ngag 'khyal pa rnams las gzhung ma bsnyegs pa mthol zhing bshags so //
NK016(ma)003:1183: mi spang ba'i dam tshig lnga las 'das te /
NK016(ma)003:1185: zhe sdang dang gti mug dang /
NK016(ma)003:1187: phrag dog rnams las gzhung ma bsnyegs pa mthol zhing bshags so //
NK016(ma)003:1188: dang du blang ba'i dam tshig lnga las 'das te /
NK016(ma)003:1193: rdo rje zil pa rnams las gzhung ma bsnyegs pa mthol zhing bshags so //
NK016(ma)003:1194: shes par bya ba'i dam tshig lnga las 'das te /
NK016(ma)003:1199: kha dog lnga la sogs pa rnams /
NK016(ma)003:1206: lha dang lha mo'i rang bzhin du ma 'tshal ba mthol zhing bshags so //
NK016(ma)003:1207: bsgrub par bya ba'i dam tshig lnga las 'das te /
NK016(ma)003:1208: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang /
NK016(ma)003:1212: las kyi rigs la sogs te /
NK016(ma)003:1213: rigs lnga'i bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub thob par bgyid rgyu las /
NK016(ma)003:1214: 'bad rtsol dang brtson 'grus chung ba mthol zhing bshags so //
NK016(ma)003:1215: gzhan yang sgrub pa khyad par gyi dam tshig nyi shu dang /
NK016(ma)003:1216: spyod pa rgyun gyi dam tshig bzhi dang /
NK016(ma)003:1217: rang bzhin lta ba'i dam tshig bzhi dang /
NK016(ma)003:1218: gal mdo nges pa'i dam tshig gsum la sogs te
NK016(ma)003:1219: nang pa thabs kyi rgyud gzhung las 'byung ba'i dam
NK016(ma)003:1220: tshig rnams kyi bsrung mtshams mi shes shing /
NK016(ma)003:1221: gzhung dang 'gal ba ci bgyis pa thams cad mthong zhing bshags so //
NK016(ma)003:1222: gzhan yang gsang sngags kyi rgyud kun gyi lung las 'byung ba'i dam tshig dang /
NK016(ma)003:1223: byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa dang //
NK016(ma)003:1225: 'jig rten pa'i khrims mna' las 'gal ba ci bgyis pa mthol zhing bshags so //
NK016(ma)003:1226: gzhan yang bka' zab mo khyad du bsad de /
NK016(ma)003:1227: skye bo rang thad kyi dbang gis nor dang gsug gi dbang du btang ste /
NK016(ma)003:1228: dkon mchog gsum gyi sku dgra'i sngags bzlog byas pa dang /
NK016(ma)003:1229: pra ti ha na dus kya mchod pa chen po la bsngosa pa dang /
NK016(ma)003:1230: ma h+aa bo d+hi la sogs pa dkon mchog gsum
NK016(ma)003:1231: gyi dkor la thug thub bgyis nas spyad pa dang
NK016(ma)003:1232: / khyad par du yang tshogs mchod chen mo la bsngosa pa dang /
NK016(ma)003:1233: sgom sgrub zab mo la bsngosa pa la sogs pa /
NK016(ma)003:1234: mchod pa'i yo byad thams cad la tshod yod bgyis te dngos su spyad pa dang /
NK016(ma)003:1235: dbri gzhog bgyis te ngan song gi rgyu bsags pa mthol zhing bshags so //
NK016(ma)003:1236: gzhan yang yan lag gi dam tshig stong rtsa brgyad las 'das te /
NK016(ma)003:1237: ngan song 'khor ba'i rgyu bsags pa thams cad mthol zhing bshags so //
NK016(ma)003:1238: gzhan yang gsang sngags kyi sgor zhugs so 'tshal gyis /
NK016(ma)003:1239: ma rig pa'i dbang gis dam tshig ngo ma 'tshal te /
NK016(ma)003:1241: las ngan sna tshogs spyad pas /
NK016(ma)003:1242: sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyi rgyu bsags pa mthol zhing bshags so //
NK016(ma)003:1245: dus bzhi la sogs pa dus dam du bcas pa las 'das te /
NK016(ma)003:1246: dus las g.yel ba'i nyams chag thams cad mthol zhing bshags so //
NK016(ma)003:1247: gzhan yang chos spyod bcu'i sgo nas //
NK016(ma)003:1248: dge ba' phyogs bgyid par dam bcas pa las rngo ma thogs pa dang /
NK016(ma)003:1249: sdig pa mi dge ba'i las ci mchis pa thams cad mthol zhing bshags so //
NK016(ma)003:1250: sgyu 'phrul ye shes rang snang gi lha la rtog pa mi mnga' yang /
NK016(ma)003:1251: de'i 'khor du gtogs pa'i ye shes dang /
NK016(ma)003:1252: las las grub pa'i legs nyes kyi stangs 'dzin cing
NK016(ma)003:1253: dam tshig gi rjes gcod pa'i bstan pa gnyan po
NK016(ma)003:1254: srung ba dang / chos skyong ba rnams kyi thugs
NK016(ma)003:1255: dang 'gal ba ci bgyis pa thams cad mthol zhing
NK016(ma)003:1256: srung ba dang / bshags so // gzhan yang phyogs
NK016(ma)003:1257: bcu dus gsum gyi rnal 'byor pa mched dang lcam
NK016(ma)003:1258: dral rnams kyi thugs dang 'gal ba'i las ci bgyis
NK016(ma)003:1259: pa thams cad mthol zhing bshags so //
NK016(ma)003:1260: de ltar mthol bshags zab mo dang //
NK016(ma)003:1261: 'gyod tshangs drag po shin tu gnong 'gyod dang bcas
NK016(ma)003:1262: pa bgyis pas rtsa ba dang yan lag gi dam
NK016(ma)003:1263: tshig nyams pa sor chud de nyams chag thams cad
NK016(ma)003:1265: bka' la ras chod byed cing sbas pa'i gsang ba la mngon par 'chal ba dang /
NK016(ma)003:1266: ta na sgrol ba gnas su ma stob pa dang /
NK016(ma)003:1267: ga na sbyor ba byin gyis ma brlabs pa la sogs pa /
NK016(ma)003:1268: gsang sngags spyad nyes pa'i dbang gis ngan song gi
NK016(ma)003:1269: rgyu bsags pa thams cad byang zhing dag par gyur
NK016(ma)003:1270: cig / bsnyen sgrub zab mo dam du bcas pa las /
NK016(ma)003:1271: rang nyams dang tshod yod du gyur te /
NK016(ma)003:1272: mchod pa lo zlar 'das pa dang /
NK016(ma)003:1273: nya stong dus tshod las 'das pa dang /
NK016(ma)003:1274: dge ba'i phyogs bgyid par dam bcas pa las rngo ma thogs pas /
NK016(ma)003:1275: ngan song gi rgyu bsags pa thams cad byang zhing dag par gyur cig /
NK016(ma)003:1276: dus kyi mchod pa chen po la bsngosa pa'i yo byad dang /
NK016(ma)003:1277: ma h+aa bo d+hi mchod rten chen po'i yo byad dang /
NK016(ma)003:1278: sgom sgrub zab mo'i yo byad dang /
NK016(ma)003:1279: gzhan yang phud la gzhogs shing /
NK016(ma)003:1283: pre ta ka yi dwags kyi rgyu bsags pa thams cad byang zhing dag par gyur cig /
NK016(ma)003:1284: ma rig pa'i dbang gis spa lo dang /
NK016(ma)003:1285: tshul 'chos kyis gsang sngags spyad nyes pa'i lta spyod zab mo gzhung ma bsrangs pa dang /
NK016(ma)003:1286: yang dag pa yin nam ma yin snyam nas sems la rtog pa byung ba dang /
NK016(ma)003:1287: yin par ngo shes kyang sems la sel zhugs te /
NK016(ma)003:1288: shes bzhin du ma spyad pas /
NK016(ma)003:1289: tir+ya ka byol song gi rgyu bsags pa thams cad byang zhing dag par gyur cig /
NK016(ma)003:1290: chos nyid don gyi lta ba ni ma rtogs /
NK016(ma)003:1291: kha 'byams tshig gi lta ba la gding du byas nas /
NK016(ma)003:1292: dam tshig nyams pa can dang /
NK016(ma)003:1296: gsang sngags kyi snod du mi rung ba rnams la chos bshad pa dang /
NK016(ma)003:1299: tshig tu 'dzags shing spyod lam rtsings pa dang /
NK016(ma)003:1300: snod med pa la gsang sngags spel ba la sogs pa 'bag 'bog gi las bgyis pas /
NK016(ma)003:1301: phyi nang gi dam can rnams kyi thugs dang 'gal bas /
NK016(ma)003:1302: 'jig rten 'di'i rkyen du gyur te tshe thung zhing nad mang ba dang /
NK016(ma)003:1303: phyi ma'i sgrib par gyur pa thams cad byang zhing dag par gyur cig /
NK016(ma)003:1304: gzhan yang bdag cag rnal 'byor pa 'dir 'tshogs shing 'dus pa rnams kyis /
NK016(ma)003:1306: gsang sngags kyi sgor zhugs pa mtha' dag gi nyams chag dang /
NK016(ma)003:1307: rtog sgrib thams cad byang zhing dag par gyur cig /
NK016(ma)003:1308: de lta bu'i 'gyod tshangs rnal 'byor gyi spyi khrus 'di dang /
NK016(ma)003:1309: deng gi rgyu mchog tan gana kyi mchod pa zab mo 'di la rten byas te /
NK016(ma)003:1310: 'gyod tshangs phul bas tshangs pa gnang bar gsol te /
NK016(ma)003:1311: slan chad kyang mi bgyid par gyur cig /
NK016(ma)003:1312: de ltar tshangs par gsol ba'i bden pa'i byin rlabs kyis /
NK016(ma)003:1313: bdag cag 'dir 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor pa mched dang lcam dral rnams dang /
NK016(ma)003:1314: gzhan yang gsang sngags kyi sgor zhugs so 'tshal thams cad kyi sgrib pa byang ste /
NK016(ma)003:1315: phyag rgya chen po'i rig 'dzin gyi sa la lhun gyis grub par gyur cig /
NK016(ma)003:1316: bdag cag gi dus gsum gyi rdo rje slob dpon dang /
NK016(ma)003:1321: dam rdzas rgyu bsgral lo 'tshal la sogs pa thams
NK016(ma)003:1322: cad kyang phyir mi ldog pa'i sa non te ye
NK016(ma)003:1323: shes bla ma'i sa la lhun gyis grub par gyur
NK016(ma)003:1324: cig / de lta bu'i bden pas sa chen po
NK016(ma)003:1325: la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni shes
NK016(ma)003:1326: bya'i bag chags phra mo man chad /
NK016(ma)003:1327: gnyen po rdo rje lta bu'i ye shes chen pos sbyangs te /
NK016(ma)003:1328: sa bcu rim gyis bgrod de mthar phyin nas bcu
NK016(ma)003:1329: gcig kun tu 'od kyi sa 'thob par gyur cig
NK016(ma)003:1330: / rang byang chub rnams ni rten 'brel bcu gnyis
NK016(ma)003:1331: mthar phyin pa'i 'bras bu bse ru'am ne tso lta
NK016(ma)003:1333: nyan thos rnams ni bden pa bzhi mthar phyin pa'i 'bras bu dgra bcom pa 'thob par gyur cig /
NK016(ma)003:1334: khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad kyang chos dge
NK016(ma)003:1335: ba bcu spyad par gyur te lha dang mi'i go
NK016(ma)003:1338: mi rnams ni chos spyod bcu'i sgor zhugs te dkon
NK016(ma)003:1339: mchog gsum gyi gdung 'dzin cing theg pa chen por
NK016(ma)003:1340: sems bskyed nas // gsang sngags rdo rje theg pa
NK016(ma)003:1341: ma nor bar ston pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen tshad
NK016(ma)003:1343: des bstan pa'i don ma nor bar 'grel zhing rtogs
NK016(ma)003:1344: nas rig 'dzin rnams gsum myur du 'grub par gyur
NK016(ma)003:1345: cig / de lta bu'i 'gyod tshangs la brten nas /
NK016(ma)003:1346: bdag cag gi man ngag gi don ston pa'i rdo rje slob dpon dang /
NK016(ma)003:1347: dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams kyang sku tshe ring ba dang /
NK016(ma)003:1349: dgongs dpyod thams cad lhun gyis grub ste /
NK016(ma)003:1350: bstan pa'i sgron me mdzad la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig /
NK016(ma)003:1351: bdag cag rnal 'byor pa 'dir 'dus shing tshogs pa rnams ni /
NK016(ma)003:1356: 'byor pa phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan te /
NK016(ma)003:1357: bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du grub par gyur cig /
NK016(ma)003:1358: gsang ba'i theg pa chen po 'di yang bka' btsan
NK016(ma)003:1359: zhing byin che ste dar zhing rgyas par gyur cig
NK016(ma)003:1360: / gsang sngags zab mo 'di dar ba'i yul khams la sogs te /
NK016(ma)003:1361: rgyal khams thams cad du dus kyi 'khrug pa zhi bar gyur cig /
NK016(ma)003:1362: mtshon gyi bskal ba nyams par gyur cig /
NK016(ma)003:1363: mi nad dang phyugs nad thams cad rgyun chad par gyur cig /
NK016(ma)003:1364: char chu dus su phebs te /
NK016(ma)003:1365: lo phyugs rtag tu legs pa dang /
NK016(ma)003:1366: sems can thams bde skyid phun sum tshogs pa dang
NK016(ma)003:1367: ldan te bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par
NK016(ma)003:1368: gyur cig / dri med rgyal po bshags pa'i rgyud las /
NK016(ma)003:1369: nyams chag dang rtog sgrib sbyong ba'i bshags pa ste le'u gsum pa'o //
NK016(ma)003:1371: // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thugs rje
NK016(ma)003:1372: dam tshig la gnas pa rnams kyis brjod med kyi
NK016(ma)003:1375: / ye shes sku mchog rang bzhin dkyil 'khor ni //
NK016(ma)003:1376: zla rgyas bzhin du spros pa mi mnga' yang //
NK016(ma)003:1377: thugs rje nyi gsal 'od bzhin snyoms mdzad pa //
NK016(ma)003:1378: 'dir gshegs bdag la dgongs shing bzhugs su gsol //
NK016(ma)003:1379: brjod med shes rab mi g.yo chos kyi sku //
NK016(ma)003:1380: bde chen longs spyod rdzogs sku rigs lnga'i gtso //
NK016(ma)003:1381: thugs rje thabs mkhas rgya cher rol pa yi //
NK016(ma)003:1382: zhi khro sprul pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo //
