NK016(ma)003:1383: dngos su 'byor dang yid kyis rnam sprul pa'i //
NK016(ma)003:1384: kun tu bzang po bla med mchod sprin gyis //
NK016(ma)003:1385: mkha' dbyings rnam dag rgya chen yongs bkod de //
NK016(ma)003:1386: phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa rgya mtshos mchod //
NK016(ma)003:1387: kun tu bzang mo gsang ba'i b+ha ga la //
NK016(ma)003:1388: rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor rab 'byams ma lus kun //
NK016(ma)003:1389: 'du 'bral med pa'i ngang du ro gcig pas //
NK016(ma)003:1390: gnyis med byang chub sems kyi mnyes gyur cig /
NK016(ma)003:1391: sems kyi rang bzhin chos dbyings nam mkha' che //
NK016(ma)003:1392: chos rnams rnam dag ye nas 'od gsal zhing //
NK016(ma)003:1393: rnal 'byor nyid dbyings smra bsam las 'das pa //
NK016(ma)003:1394: mnyam nyid byang chub sems la rtag tu 'dud //
NK016(ma)003:1395: kun bzang rdzogs chen ye nas gdal ba la //
NK016(ma)003:1396: phyi nang gsang ba bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor ni //
NK016(ma)003:1397: snang srid rnam dag lha dang lha mo'i dbyings //
NK016(ma)003:1398: 'byung dang 'byung 'gyur yab yum lhun rdzogs rnams //
NK016(ma)003:1399: gsang chen rab dgyes gzungs chen bdag nyid ma //
NK016(ma)003:1400: mkha' dbyings klong yangs pad+mara 'khyil ba ni //
NK016(ma)003:1401: gnyis med thig le chen por 'od gsal ba //
NK016(ma)003:1402: ma bcos spros med byang chub snying po'i sku //
NK016(ma)003:1403: cir yang snang ba bde chen g.yung drung lha //
NK016(ma)003:1405: bdag nyid chen po rigs lnga yab yum dang //
NK016(ma)003:1406: byang chub lcam dral khro bo khro mo'i tshogs //
NK016(ma)003:1407: rdo rje lha mo tshogs rje tshogs kyi bdag /
NK016(ma)003:1408: rigs lnga dpal chen khro rgyal yab yum bcu //
NK016(ma)003:1409: gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya sgo ma bzhi //
NK016(ma)003:1410: ye shes sprul pa'i lha tshogs mang po rnams //
NK016(ma)003:1411: ma ltar byams shing sring ltar gdung la sogs //
NK016(ma)003:1412: legs nyes stangs 'dzin dam tshig rjes gcod pa'i //
NK016(ma)003:1413: phyi nang mkha' 'gro rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs //
NK016(ma)003:1414: dpang gyur rdo rje dam can dgongs su gsol //
NK016(ma)003:1415: thugs rje'i gdung 'tshob rnal 'byor bdag cag gis //
NK016(ma)003:1416: 'gro ba'i don du byang chub sems bskyed de //
NK016(ma)003:1417: bla med go 'phang bgrod par bya ba'i phyir //
NK016(ma)003:1418: bstan pa rgya mtsho so so'i 'dul khrims dang //
NK016(ma)003:1419: sku gsung thugs dang mnyam sbyor sdom pa'i mchog /
NK016(ma)003:1420: rdo rje 'da' dka' dam tshig gtan gyi gnyer //
NK016(ma)003:1421: spyi dang khyad par lhag pa'i dam tshig rnams //
NK016(ma)003:1422: snga phyir mnos shing gnyer du smras so 'tshal //
NK016(ma)003:1423: yun du mi gtong 'da' bar mi bgyid la //
NK016(ma)003:1424: don las gol zhing zlog sems ma mchis kyang //
NK016(ma)003:1425: gdod bya long yod snyam pa'i le lo yis //
NK016(ma)003:1426: klong du ma gyur rtsal shugs chung ba dang //
NK016(ma)003:1427: shes bzhin mi ldan bag med dbang gyur te //
NK016(ma)003:1428: sgom la mi brtson bsnyen sgrub g.yel la sogs //
NK016(ma)003:1429: tshor dang ma tshor ma rig dbang gis ni //
NK016(ma)003:1430: ston pa'i bka' dang dam las 'gal gyur te //
NK016(ma)003:1431: rnal 'byor gang zhig dam tshig nyams pa dang //
NK016(ma)003:1432: skad cig tsam yang 'phrad par mi bya zhes //
NK016(ma)003:1433: bka' las byung yang de ltar ma lcogs te //
NK016(ma)003:1434: gsang sgo 'chol bas dbye bsal dka' ba la //
NK016(ma)003:1435: mngon shes chung bas skyon can ma rtogs te //
NK016(ma)003:1436: nyams dang tshogs 'dres nyams pa skang ba dang //
NK016(ma)003:1437: nyams la mi 'dzem nyams pa'i skyon la sogs //
NK016(ma)003:1438: nyams dang 'grogs shing nyams pa de dag gi //
NK016(ma)003:1439: nyams grib skyon gyis gos par gyur to 'tshal //
NK016(ma)003:1440: tshe 'di'i rkyen dang yun gyi sgrib pa rnams //
NK016(ma)003:1441: rab gnong 'gyod pa'i sems kyis mthol lo bshags //
NK016(ma)003:1442: byams pa'i thugs rjes bdag la dgongs nas kyang //
NK016(ma)003:1443: gnyis med dbyings las mi 'gyur bdag bkod de //
NK016(ma)003:1444: mi dmigs btang snyoms ngang du bzhugs nas kyang //
NK016(ma)003:1445: gnyis med don gyi tshangs pa stsal du gsol /
NK016(ma)003:1446: don dam gnyis med spros dang bral ba la //
NK016(ma)003:1447: rnam rtog gang yang dmigs par mi 'gyur te //
NK016(ma)003:1448: kun rdzob sgyu ma tsam gyi dbang gis na //
NK016(ma)003:1449: nongs pa mchis rnams rab gnong bzod par gsol //
NK016(ma)003:1451: dri med rgyal po bshags pa'i rgyud las /
NK016(ma)003:1452: ye shes lha dang 'khon gcugs bshags pa ste le'u bzhi pa'o //
NK016(ma)003:1454: // de nas rgyal pa thams cad kyi thugs rje'i dam
NK016(ma)003:1455: tshig la gnas pa'i rig 'dzin yab kyi tshogs rnams
NK016(ma)003:1456: kyis bshags pa'i rgyal po nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa
NK016(ma)003:1457: 'di gsungs so // ston pa rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa yi /
NK016(ma)003:1458: lung dang tan+t+ra mang po mdor bsdus shing //
NK016(ma)003:1459: gsang sngags ma h+aa yo ga'i sgor zhugs pa'i //
NK016(ma)003:1460: mi 'da' rdo rje dam tshig gtan gyi gnyer //
NK016(ma)003:1461: dam la gnas shing tshul bzhin bsrung ngo zhes //
NK016(ma)003:1462: bka' gsang rgyud las de skad 'byung bzhin du //
NK016(ma)003:1463: ma rig le lo sgyid snyom rkyen dbang gis //
NK016(ma)003:1464: bka' las 'das shing dam las g.yel gyur pa //
NK016(ma)003:1465: rab gnong 'gyod pa'i sems kyis mthol bshags na //
NK016(ma)003:1466: mi dmigs btang snyoms ngang du bzod par bzhes //
NK016(ma)003:1467: rtsa ba sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig las //
NK016(ma)003:1468: sri zhu dad pa'i rtsal shugs chung ba yis //
NK016(ma)003:1469: rdo rje slob dpon thugs dang 'gal ba dang //
NK016(ma)003:1470: brtse gdung khrel 'dzem chung ba'i rang shugs kyis //
NK016(ma)003:1471: mched dang lcam dral thugs dang 'gal ba dang //
NK016(ma)003:1472: sngags dang phyag rgya le lo rgyun bcad de //
NK016(ma)003:1473: gsung gi dam las 'das par gyur pa dang //
NK016(ma)003:1474: spyi gsang bzhi dang bar gsang brgyad la sogs //
NK016(ma)003:1475: gsang bar 'os dang gsang bar gnyer gtad pa //
NK016(ma)003:1476: gsang sgo yal bar btang ba la sogs te //
NK016(ma)003:1477: rtsa ba'i dam las 'gal ba ci mchis pa //
NK016(ma)003:1478: rab gnong 'gyod pa'i sems kyis mtho la bshags na //
NK016(ma)003:1479: mkha' ltar khyab pa'i thugs rjes bdag bzung nas //
NK016(ma)003:1480: nyams pa'i skyon rnams bshags na byang ba dang //
NK016(ma)003:1481: sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub stsal du gsol //
NK016(ma)003:1482: mi spang ba yi dam tshig lnga po la //
NK016(ma)003:1483: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug nga rgyal dang //
NK016(ma)003:1484: phrag dog la sogs nyon mongs lnga rnams ni //
NK016(ma)003:1485: gsang sngags bla na med pa'i spyod yul las //
NK016(ma)003:1486: kun tu bzang po rol pa che ba'i rgyan //
NK016(ma)003:1487: rigs lnga ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin la //
NK016(ma)003:1488: ye nas yin pa de ltar ma rtogs te //
NK016(ma)003:1489: log rtog dbang gis spangs pa bzod par gsol //
NK016(ma)003:1490: dang du blang ba'i dam tshig lnga po la //
NK016(ma)003:1491: m+aam sa gshang gci khu ba rak+ta rnams //
NK016(ma)003:1492: ye nas bdud rtsi lnga yi rang bzhin la //
NK016(ma)003:1493: dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsgrubs pa'i rdzas //
NK016(ma)003:1494: rgyal ba rgya mtsho rnams kyi gshegs pa'i shul //
NK016(ma)003:1495: ye nas rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin la //
NK016(ma)003:1496: gtsang sme rnam rtog brtul zhugs chung ba yis //
NK016(ma)003:1497: chos nyid mnyam pa'i ngang du ma rtogs te //
NK016(ma)003:1498: dam rdzas dang du ma blangs bzod par gsol //
NK016(ma)003:1499: spyad par bya ba'i dam tshig lnga po la //
NK016(ma)003:1500: skye shi med par rtogs pa'i lta ba dang /
NK016(ma)003:1501: gnas dang dus dang ting 'dzin gsal ba yis //
NK016(ma)003:1502: khams gsum ma lus gnas nas bsgral ba dang //
NK016(ma)003:1503: dus gsum 'du 'bral med pa'i lta ba dang //
NK016(ma)003:1504: sngags dang phyag rgya ting 'dzin gsal ba yis //
NK016(ma)003:1505: thabs dang shes rab mngon spyod sbyor ba dang //
NK016(ma)003:1506: ser sna 'jur gegs can gyi zas dang nor //
NK016(ma)003:1507: thabs mkhas 'od zer tshul du ma byin blang //
NK016(ma)003:1508: sems can don du 'phags pa mchod pa dang //
NK016(ma)003:1509: gsang sngags lta spyod gzhan gyis mi rig phyir //
NK016(ma)003:1510: gting dpag dka' phyir rdzun du smra ba dang //
NK016(ma)003:1511: zhing bcu zhe bcad drag shul spyod pa'i sngags //
NK016(ma)003:1512: bka' dang lung las de ltar 'byung bzhin du //
NK016(ma)003:1513: spyad cing nyams su ma blangs bzod par gsol //
NK016(ma)003:1514: shes par bya ba'i dam tshig lnga po la //
NK016(ma)003:1515: phung po lnga dang rnam shes dbang po lnga //
NK016(ma)003:1516: 'byung ba lnga dang 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga //
NK016(ma)003:1517: kha dog lnga dang sman lnga la sogs rnams //
NK016(ma)003:1518: rigs lnga ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin dang //
NK016(ma)003:1519: rigs kyi yum lngar shes par bya'o zhes //
NK016(ma)003:1520: rgyal ba'i bka' las de ltar byung bzhin du //
NK016(ma)003:1521: shes rab zhan pas de ltar ma rtogs te //
NK016(ma)003:1522: bka' dang gzhung las 'gal ba bzod par gsol //
NK016(ma)003:1523: bsgrub par bya ba'i dam tshig lnga po la //
NK016(ma)003:1524: phyi nang snod bcud snang srid ma lus rnams //
NK016(ma)003:1525: ye nas sangs rgyas lnga yi rang bzhin la //
NK016(ma)003:1526: bdag gi dbyings las gzhan na mi bzhugs kyang //
NK016(ma)003:1527: go rtogs rig pa'i rtsal shugs chung ba yis //
NK016(ma)003:1528: rtogs pa klong du ma gyur bzod par bzhes //
NK016(ma)003:1529: tshogs kyi mchod pa lo zla 'das pa dang //
NK016(ma)003:1530: tshogs kyi zhal zas 'byor tshogs chung ba dang //
NK016(ma)003:1531: rdo rje slob dpon thugs dang 'gal ba dang //
NK016(ma)003:1532: dam skongs mkha' 'gro'i thugs dang 'gal pa dang //
NK016(ma)003:1533: brtse gdung khrel 'dzem chung ba'i rang shugs kyis //
NK016(ma)003:1534: mched dang lcam dral thugs dang 'gal ba dang //
NK016(ma)003:1535: lung dang bka' las 'das pa mthol lo bshags //
NK016(ma)003:1536: lta ba 'phangs ma chod par gyur pa dang //
NK016(ma)003:1537: spyod pa la ma dor bar gyur pa dang /
NK016(ma)003:1538: dam tshig nyams pa'i chad pa mi bzod pas //
NK016(ma)003:1539: rdo rje srin pos snying khrag 'thung ba dang //
NK016(ma)003:1540: tshe thung nad mang nor yal dgras 'jigs dang //
NK016(ma)003:1541: mnar med dmyal ba shin du skyi g.ya' bar //
NK016(ma)003:1542: sdug bsngal mi bzod yun ring gnas pa rnams //
NK016(ma)003:1543: bdag gis dam tshig bshags pa bgyis pa yis //
NK016(ma)003:1544: nyams shing chag pa thams cad sor chud de //
NK016(ma)003:1545: go 'phang chen po'i 'phras bu thob par shog /
NK016(ma)003:1546: dus gsum rgyal bas bdag la byin gyis rlobs //
NK016(ma)003:1547: dam skongs mkha' 'gro mang pos bdag srungs shig /
NK016(ma)003:1548: gnyis med gsang ba'i dbyings nas 'od shar te //
NK016(ma)003:1549: mkha' ltar dag cing rnam rtog mi mnga' yang //
NK016(ma)003:1550: sngon gyi thugs rje'i dbang gis bdag bzung ste //
NK016(ma)003:1551: yid bzhin sku mchog bdag la bstan pa dang //
NK016(ma)003:1552: rig 'dzin dngos grub dbyings nas bdag la stsol //
NK016(ma)003:1553: lha dang lha min phyogs bcu'i rnal 'byor rnams //
NK016(ma)003:1554: mi 'da' rdo rje dam tshig gtan gyi gnyer //
NK016(ma)003:1555: rtsa ba gsum dang yan lag nyi shu lnga //
NK016(ma)003:1556: tshor dang ma tshor ma rig dbang gis na //
NK016(ma)003:1557: nyams pa'i skyon gyis gos bar gyur to 'tshal //
NK016(ma)003:1558: bdag gis dam tshig gdungs pa'i bshags pa 'dis //
NK016(ma)003:1559: rnal 'byor dam tshig nyams pa bskangs gyur nas //
NK016(ma)003:1560: go 'phang chen po'i 'bras bu thob par shog /
NK016(ma)003:1561: khams gsum 'khor ba'i sems can ma lus rnams //
NK016(ma)003:1562: mnyam nyid rdo rje'i gral du gnas par shog /
NK016(ma)003:1563: mkha' 'gro ma yi thugs rjes bdag bzung zhing //
NK016(ma)003:1564: nyams pa'i skyon rnams gtan nas byang ba dang //
NK016(ma)003:1565: sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub stsal du gsol //
NK016(ma)003:1567: dri med rgyal po bshags pa'i rgyud las /
NK016(ma)003:1568: nyams grib bskang ba'i bshags pa ste le'u lnga pa'o //
NK016(ma)003:1570: // de nas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi dam tshig
NK016(ma)003:1571: la gnas pa'i rig 'dzin yum kyi tshogs rnams kyis
NK016(ma)003:1573: ye shes lha dang mkha' 'gro dam tshig can //
NK016(ma)003:1574: phyi nang srung ma ma lus dgongs su gsol //
NK016(ma)003:1575: yun ring dus nas bsnyen cing bsgrubs pa'i lha //
NK016(ma)003:1576: srung ma dam can ma lus dgongs su gsol //
NK016(ma)003:1577: rdo rje slob dpon mched dang lcam dral dang //
NK016(ma)003:1578: rig 'dzin sgrub po rnams kyang dgongs su gsol //
NK016(ma)003:1579: rnal 'byor dam tshig bsrung bar zhal 'ches pa'i //
NK016(ma)003:1580: sku gsum gdung 'tshob rnams kyang dgongs su gsol //
NK016(ma)003:1581: bkod pa'i rgyal po dam tshig 'bum sde las //
NK016(ma)003:1582: yo ga rnams pa bzhi yi don ched du //
NK016(ma)003:1583: mkhyen rab mchog tu gyur pa'i gsang bdag gis //
NK016(ma)003:1584: nyi shu rtsa brgyad mdor bsdus grangs bstan pa //
NK016(ma)003:1585: rtogs nas bsrung zhing bsgrub par dam bcas pa'i //
NK016(ma)003:1586: tshul lam gzhung bzhin sgrub rngo ma thogs par //
NK016(ma)003:1587: ma rig bdag cag lus dang ngag sems kyis //
NK016(ma)003:1588: bag med tshul gyis dam las 'gal gyur te //
NK016(ma)003:1589: ras chod rang gar bsrung mtshams 'das pa dang //
NK016(ma)003:1590: ma rtogs ma bsrungs sgrub pa'i rtsal chung bas //
NK016(ma)003:1591: rtsa ba yan lag bcas pa'i dam tshig las //
NK016(ma)003:1592: nyams chag 'gal 'khrul gyur pa mthol lo bshags //
NK016(ma)003:1593: rdo rje slob dpon mched dang lcam dral la //
NK016(ma)003:1594: log lta ngan sems brku 'phrog brdeg la sogs //
NK016(ma)003:1595: ngan du smra zhing gnod pa dngos su bgyis //
NK016(ma)003:1596: sku yi dam tshig nyams pa mthol lo bshags //
NK016(ma)003:1597: yi dam lha yi ting 'dzin g.yel gyur cing //
NK016(ma)003:1598: phyag rgya rnam bzhi gzhung bzhin ma gsal te //
NK016(ma)003:1599: sngags dang bzlas brjod snying po bar chod pas //
NK016(ma)003:1600: gsung gi dam tshig nyams pa mthol lo bshags //
NK016(ma)003:1601: gsang bcu la sogs man ngag gnyer gtad pa //
NK016(ma)003:1602: dam tshig nyams dang ma 'dres med pa la //
NK016(ma)003:1603: tshig tu 'dzags shing spyod lam rtsings pa yis //
NK016(ma)003:1604: thugs kyi dam tshig nyams pa mthol zhing bshags //
NK016(ma)003:1605: spyad par bya ba'i dam tshig rnam pa lnga //
NK016(ma)003:1606: sbyor sgrol ma byin len dang rdzun du smra //
NK016(ma)003:1607: tshig barlanga la sogs dam tshig smad lnga ni //
NK016(ma)003:1608: gnyis su med pa'i ngang du mnyam sbyar nas //
NK016(ma)003:1609: 'gro ba'i don du gzhung bzhin spyad rgyu la //
NK016(ma)003:1610: bka' dang bzhung bzhin spyad par ma gyur te //
NK016(ma)003:1611: ma rig log par spyad pa'i nyes byas kyis //
NK016(ma)003:1612: spyad pa'i dam tshig nyams pa mthol zhing bshags //
NK016(ma)003:1613: mi spang ba yi dam tshig rnam lnga ni //
NK016(ma)003:1614: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug nga rgyal dang //
NK016(ma)003:1615: phrag dog la sogs nyon mongs rnam lnga ni //
NK016(ma)003:1616: ye nas rigs lnga'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir //
NK016(ma)003:1617: rtogs nas spang du med par gnas rgyu la //
NK016(ma)003:1618: de bzhin ma rtogs nyon mongs rang gar spyad //
NK016(ma)003:1619: mi spang dam tshig nyams pa mthol zhing bshags //
NK016(ma)003:1620: dang du blang ba'i dam tshig lnga po ni //
NK016(ma)003:1621: dri chen dri chu dmar chen zil pa dang //
NK016(ma)003:1622: sha chen la sogs dam rdzas rnam pa lnga //
NK016(ma)003:1623: grub pa bzhi dang yin pa gsum la sogs //
NK016(ma)003:1624: so so'i rnam par rtog pa kun sbyongs shing //
NK016(ma)003:1625: dngos grub sgrub par byed pa'i thabs chen po //
NK016(ma)003:1626: 'dzin rtog med par dang du blang rgyu la //
NK016(ma)003:1627: gnyis med lta bas dang du ma blangs te //
NK016(ma)003:1628: gtsang smer bltas nas tshul bzhin ma blangs pas //
NK016(ma)003:1629: rten pa'i dam tshig nyams pa mthol zhing bshags //
NK016(ma)003:1630: shes par bya ba'i dam tshig lnga rnams la //
NK016(ma)003:1631: phung po lnga dang 'byung ba chen po lnga //
NK016(ma)003:1632: kha dog lnga dang yul lnga dbang po lnga //
NK016(ma)003:1633: rnam shes lnga dang rigs lnga ye shes lnga //
NK016(ma)003:1634: yab lnga yum lngar sbyor zhing shes pa yis //
NK016(ma)003:1635: rtog pa khyad par can du bgyid rgyu las //
NK016(ma)003:1636: rmongs shing 'khrul bas de ltar ma rtogs te //
NK016(ma)003:1637: nyan thos la sogs theg pa 'og ma las //
NK016(ma)003:1638: rtog pa khyad par can du ma gyur te //
NK016(ma)003:1639: shes bya'i dam tshig nyams pa mthol zhing bshags //
NK016(ma)003:1640: bsgrub par bya ba'i dam tshig rnam lnga la //
NK016(ma)003:1641: rdo rje'i rigs dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs //
NK016(ma)003:1642: rin chen rigs dang de bzhin pad+ma'i rigs //
NK016(ma)003:1643: las kyi rigs la sogs te sangs rgyas lnga //
NK016(ma)003:1644: 'di ni bsgrub par bya ba'i 'bras su ste //
NK016(ma)003:1645: sgom sgrub ting 'dzin le lo med pa yis //
NK016(ma)003:1646: sgrub pa'i 'bras bu thob par bgyid rgyu la //
NK016(ma)003:1647: 'bad pa'i rtsal chung sgom sgrub yun thung bas //
NK016(ma)003:1648: sgrub pa'i 'bras bu da dung ma thob ste //
NK016(ma)003:1649: bsgrub bya'i dam tshig nyams pa mthol zhing bshags //
NK016(ma)003:1650: de la sogs te dam tshig chen po yi //
NK016(ma)003:1651: gzhung dang 'gal bar gyur pas nyes byas shing //
NK016(ma)003:1652: ye shes lha dang mkha' 'gro dam tshig can //
NK016(ma)003:1653: ma sring rgya mtsho'i thugs dang ci 'gal ba //
NK016(ma)003:1654: shin tu gnong zhing 'gyod pas mthol zhing bshags //
NK016(ma)003:1655: rdo rje slob dpon mched dang lcam dral dang //
NK016(ma)003:1656: rnal 'byor dam can thugs dang ci 'gal ba //
NK016(ma)003:1657: dam las 'gal gyur 'gyod pas mthol zhing bshags //
NK016(ma)003:1658: bdag gis rtse gcig zol zog med pa yis //
NK016(ma)003:1659: sgyu ma'i sems kyis bshags sbyang 'di brjod pas //
NK016(ma)003:1660: bdag nyid nyams chag sgrib pa 'dir byang nas //
NK016(ma)003:1661: tshe 'di nyid la rig 'dzin sa thob ste //
NK016(ma)003:1662: byin rlabs rtsal 'phang gzi brjid nus mthu dang //
NK016(ma)003:1663: sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub rtsal du gsol //
NK016(ma)003:1665: dri med rgyal po bshags pa'i rgyud las /
NK016(ma)003:1666: dam tshig nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'i bshags pa ste le'u drug pa'o //
NK016(ma)003:1668: // de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dam tshig la
NK016(ma)003:1669: gnas pa'i dpal chen po rnams kyis bshags pa 'di
NK016(ma)003:1670: gsungs so // bcom ldan dpal chen khro rgyal phyag brnyan ni //
NK016(ma)003:1671: thabs mkhas thugs rje ye shes sprul pa dang //
NK016(ma)003:1672: rang rgyud rnal 'byor dag pa'i grub pa can //
NK016(ma)003:1673: rdo rje lcam dral mang po dgongs su gsol //
NK016(ma)003:1674: kun tu bzang po rdo rje 'dzin pa yi //
NK016(ma)003:1675: snying la gnas pa'i dam tshig byin brlabs pa //
NK016(ma)003:1676: theg chen khyed kyis dang du bzhes nas kyang //
NK016(ma)003:1677: zhal 'ches gang lags rjes su dgongs par mdzod //
NK016(ma)003:1678: bdag gi mig la sogs te dbang po lnga //
NK016(ma)003:1679: bem po'i rang bzhin rnam shes ma sbyangs pas //
NK016(ma)003:1680: khyed kyi sku gsung mi mthong mi thos te //
NK016(ma)003:1681: mun pa'i tshogs dang 'dra bar bcings mod kyi //
NK016(ma)003:1682: 'on kyang yid ches sems 'di rtse gcig gis //
NK016(ma)003:1683: mngon sum 'dra bar rtag tu rjes dran na //
NK016(ma)003:1684: dus gsum kun nas ma bsgribs mkhyen pa yi //
NK016(ma)003:1685: rdo rje lcam dral mang po bdag la dgongs //
NK016(ma)003:1686: ye shes mngon shes ldan zhing thugs brtse ba //
NK016(ma)003:1687: mthu rtsal rmad byung phan pa'i dgongs pa can //
NK016(ma)003:1688: gzhan gyis ma bcol nyid kyis zhal 'ches pa //
NK016(ma)003:1689: bden par gsungs pas bdag gi grogs mdzod cig /
NK016(ma)003:1690: gang dag byang chub sems dang ldan pa dang //
NK016(ma)003:1691: sku gsung thugs kyi rnal 'byor spyod pa la //
NK016(ma)003:1692: kun nas bsrung zhing re ba bskang ngo zhes //
NK016(ma)003:1693: khyod kyi thugs dam mi 'gyur de lags na //
NK016(ma)003:1694: bdag la bla med byang chub sems mchis kyis //
NK016(ma)003:1695: sku gsung rnal 'byor 'artsona par bgyid lags na //
NK016(ma)003:1696: rdo rje dam can ma lus rgya mtsho yis //
NK016(ma)003:1697: kun nas bsrung zhing re ba bskang du gsol //
NK016(ma)003:1698: theg chen rnal 'byor bskyang bar zhal 'ches pa'i //
NK016(ma)003:1699: dus dang tshad mkhyen mthu dang ldan bzhin du //
NK016(ma)003:1700: skyes mchog khyed kyang btang snyoms mdzad na ko //
NK016(ma)003:1701: dang po'i dam bcas 'gal bar mi 'gyur ram //
NK016(ma)003:1702: gang gis gang la rang gis dam bcas pa //
NK016(ma)003:1703: de yis de nyid don du gnyer dgongs pa //
NK016(ma)003:1704: gzhan gyis bskul zhing gsol gdab mi 'tshal na //
NK016(ma)003:1705: nyid kyi thugs dam 'bras bu mchis par mdzod //
NK016(ma)003:1706: bdag gi dam tshig rdo rje'i mchog gsum po //
NK016(ma)003:1707: khyed kyi thugs dam mchog kyang de lags pas //
NK016(ma)003:1708: rigs mi mthun kyang dam tshig gis bsdus na //
NK016(ma)003:1709: lcam dral tshul du nye zhing gdung bar mdzod //
NK016(ma)003:1710: sngon 'das dus na bstan pa 'jig la sogs //
NK016(ma)003:1711: zhe sdang gdug pa'i dgra bgegs gar byung yang //
NK016(ma)003:1712: khyed kyi thugs rje lhag par der phyung zhing //
NK016(ma)003:1713: drag shul thabs kyis 'dul ba ji bzhin du //
NK016(ma)003:1714: da lta dus ngan bstan pa 'jig la sogs //
NK016(ma)003:1715: sdig pa'i 'bras bu smin par khyed mkhyen gyis //
NK016(ma)003:1716: rdo rje lcam dral ma lus rgya mtsho yis //
NK016(ma)003:1717: so so'i thugs dam chen po dgongs mdzod la //
NK016(ma)003:1718: ji ltar 'tshams pa bzhin du phrin las mdzod //
NK016(ma)003:1719: dbang phyug la sogs byed por khas 'ches kyang //
NK016(ma)003:1720: de nyid dngos po lta bur byed mi nus //
NK016(ma)003:1721: khyed ni sgyu ma'i chos la mnga' brnyes pas //
NK016(ma)003:1722: sgyu ma'i rang bzhin cir yang grub par mdzod //
NK016(ma)003:1723: mi nus mngon shes mthu dang mi ldan yang //
NK016(ma)003:1724: dam tshig chos phyir srog lus phangs pa med /
NK016(ma)003:1725: khyed ni thogs med mthu dang ldan bzhin du //
NK016(ma)003:1726: 'gro ba'i mgon skyabs ci phyir bskul las bshags //
NK016(ma)003:1727: srid pa las kyi dus la ma bab ces //
NK016(ma)003:1728: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phrin las mi mdzad cing //
NK016(ma)003:1729: thams cad kun la las kyi dbang btsan na //
NK016(ma)003:1730: thugs rje'i byin rlabs su la ci zhig bgyi //
NK016(ma)003:1731: gang zhig chos min 'gal bar spyod pa yang //
NK016(ma)003:1732: 'bad pa'i 'bras bu med par mi 'gyur ram //
NK016(ma)003:1733: shes rab snying rje thabs dang mi 'gal ba'i //
NK016(ma)003:1734: re ba bskang ba lta zhig smos ci 'tshal //
NK016(ma)003:1735: 'da' dka' rdo rje'i dam tshig mchog bsrung bar //
NK016(ma)003:1736: grub pa khyod dang 'dra ba ma lags na //
NK016(ma)003:1737: chos srung 'gro don bdag gi mi lcogs pas //
NK016(ma)003:1738: byin rlabs mchog dang ldan par mdzad du gsol //
NK016(ma)003:1739: dam tshig nyams pa la sogs nyes pa rnams //
NK016(ma)003:1740: tshe rabs 'di la nyams su myong 'gyur pa //
NK016(ma)003:1741: chos dbyings 'gro don bdag gis rtogs pa ru //
NK016(ma)003:1742: chos la dbang bsgyur khyed kyis bzlog tu gsol //
NK016(ma)003:1743: thugs rje brtse ldan rdo rje lcam dral la //
NK016(ma)003:1744: 'di skad bskul zhing gsol lta mi 'tshal na //
NK016(ma)003:1745: zhe sdang mtha' yi sems kyis mi gsol te //
NK016(ma)003:1746: 'gro don byang chub sems kyis smre lags na //
NK016(ma)003:1747: thugs dang 'gal bar gyur pa bzod par gsol //
NK016(ma)003:1748: 'phags pa'i bka' chad bdag la mi gtong zhing //
NK016(ma)003:1749: thugs rje chen pos tshangs par stsal du gsol //
NK016(ma)003:1750: dri med rgyal po bshags pa'i rgyud las //
NK016(ma)003:1751: rdo rje dpal chen gyi bshags pa ste le'u bdun pa'o //
NK016(ma)003:1753: // de nas bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyis ye
NK016(ma)003:1754: shes mkha' 'gro la sogs pa mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs
NK016(ma)003:1757: / ye shes mkha' 'gro dbang phyug khro rgyal gtso //
NK016(ma)003:1758: bde chen gnyis med yum gyi dbyings su sbyor //
NK016(ma)003:1759: bdag tu lta ba'i nga rgyal 'joms mdzad pa'i //
NK016(ma)003:1760: dpang gyur rdo rje dam can dgongs su gsol //
NK016(ma)003:1761: ta na'i gnas mchog sgrol ba gnas ma stob //
NK016(ma)003:1762: ga na'i gnas mchog sbyor ba byin ma brlabs //
NK016(ma)003:1763: dpal chen khro rgyal thugs dang ci 'gal ba //
NK016(ma)003:1764: thugs rje che mnga' khyed la bzod par gsol //
NK016(ma)003:1765: rmad du byung ba'i mchod pa tan gana ni //
NK016(ma)003:1766: ye shes lnga yi 'od zer rnam par 'phro //
NK016(ma)003:1767: 'dod pa lnga yi yon tan bsam yas kyis //
NK016(ma)003:1768: ye shes mkha' 'gro'i thugs dam bskang gyur cig /
NK016(ma)003:1769: dpal chen khro rgyal yab yum thugs rje yis //
NK016(ma)003:1770: rtse gcig sgrub pa po yi grogs mdzod la //
NK016(ma)003:1771: bar gcod byed pa'i dgra bgegs rdul du rlog /
NK016(ma)003:1772: grub pa'i 'bras bu dus 'dir rtsal du gsol //
NK016(ma)003:1774: rdo rje mkha' 'gro dbang phyug goo r+ai brgyad /
NK016(ma)003:1775: sid+ha la sogs yul gyi phra men brgyad //
NK016(ma)003:1776: rta gdong la sogs 'bar pa khro mo bzhi //
NK016(ma)003:1777: dpang gyur rdo rje dam can dgongs su gsol //
NK016(ma)003:1779: / sgom sgrub dus las g.yel bar gyur pa yis //
NK016(ma)003:1780: sgrub pa'i rdzas mchog bdud rtsi a mri ta //
NK016(ma)003:1781: dus drug mchod pa'i tshul du ma sbyar ba //
NK016(ma)003:1782: bzod par gsol lo tshangs pa stsal du gsol //
NK016(ma)003:1783: byang chub sems dang m+aam sa rak+ta dang //
NK016(ma)003:1784: dri chen dri chu go ku da ha na //
NK016(ma)003:1785: gnyis med sbyar ba'i sman mchog a mri tas //
NK016(ma)003:1786: rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i thugs dam bskang gyur cig /
NK016(ma)003:1787: 'bar ba'i sku mchog rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor du //
NK016(ma)003:1788: bdud dang srin po ma lus 'dul ba'i phyir //
NK016(ma)003:1789: rtse gcig sgrub pa po la zhal ston la //
NK016(ma)003:1790: bar gcod byed pa'i dgra bgegs rdul du rlog //
NK016(ma)003:1791: sha za mkha' 'gro dbang phyug nyi shu brgyad //
NK016(ma)003:1792: srid gsum rgyal mo dur khrod brgyad kyi yum //
NK016(ma)003:1793: gtso mo mngon spyod ma bdun 'khor dang bcas //
NK016(ma)003:1794: dpang gyur rdo rje dam can dgongs su gsol //
NK016(ma)003:1795: mchod pa lo zla'i dus las 'das pa dang //
NK016(ma)003:1796: rdzas dang phyag rgya dus 'dir ma rdzogs shing //
NK016(ma)003:1797: sha khrag dmar gyi dam las g.yel gyur te //
NK016(ma)003:1798: sha za mkha' 'gro'i thugs dang ci 'gal ba //
NK016(ma)003:1799: bzod par gsol lo tshangs pa stsal du gsol //
NK016(ma)003:1800: dur khrod rdzas mchog thal chen ba su ta //
NK016(ma)003:1801: sha khrag dmar gyi mchod pa rab sbyar te //
NK016(ma)003:1802: b+han+d+ha'i snod du dmar chen bskyil ba 'dis //
NK016(ma)003:1803: sha za mkha' 'gro'i thugs dam bskang gyur cig /
NK016(ma)003:1804: sngon tshe dpal chen khro rgyal spyan snga ru //
NK016(ma)003:1805: sus kyang ma bcol nyid kyis zhal 'ches te //
NK016(ma)003:1806: rtse gcig sgrub pa poo yi grogs mdzod la //
NK016(ma)003:1807: rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen po'i 'khor srungs shig //
NK016(ma)003:1808: las kyi mkha' 'gro phyi yi rnal 'byor bzhi //
NK016(ma)003:1809: bdag nyid chen mo la sogs ma mo'i tshogs //
NK016(ma)003:1810: lha dang lha min phyogs bcu'i mkha' 'gro ma //
NK016(ma)003:1811: dpang gyur rdo rje dam can dgongs su gsol //
NK016(ma)003:1812: lta ba mthos pas spyod lam rtsings ba dang //
NK016(ma)003:1813: nya stong gso sbyong dus las g.yel gyur cing //
NK016(ma)003:1814: gnyid chang rmongs pas phyi mchod ma skongs pa //
NK016(ma)003:1815: bzod par gsol lo tshangs pa stsal du gsol //
NK016(ma)003:1816: dam tshig lhag ma kha chu'i 'od zer 'phro //
NK016(ma)003:1817: kun tu bzang po'i mchod sprin a mri ta //
NK016(ma)003:1818: sha khrag bdud rtsi'i mchod pa chen po 'dis //
NK016(ma)003:1819: las kyi mkha' 'gro'i thugs dam bskang gyur cig //
NK016(ma)003:1820: stong khams yongs su 'chol bar gyur mod kyang //
NK016(ma)003:1821: bdag ni rdo rje'i dam las mi 'da' zhing //
NK016(ma)003:1822: dpal chen bsgom bsgrub las la brtson lags na //
NK016(ma)003:1823: skyes chen khyed kyi thugs dam mnyes gyur cig /
NK016(ma)003:1824: dur khrod klong dgu'i mkha' 'gro rnam bzhi'i tshogs //
NK016(ma)003:1825: khams gsum 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal ci 'dra ba //
NK016(ma)003:1826: byams mgon khyed kyi thugs la de ltar gsal //
NK016(ma)003:1827: dmyal tshogs me ltar 'bar ba zhi bar mdzod //
NK016(ma)003:1828: thugs rje'i gdung 'tshob rig 'dzin bdag gis ni //
NK016(ma)003:1829: dang po byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed nas //
NK016(ma)003:1830: 'da' dka' rdo rje'i dam tshig mchog gsum po //
NK016(ma)003:1831: rgyal ba'i bka' las 'da' bar mi bgyid la //
NK016(ma)003:1832: gsang sngags 'chol bar gyur gyis bsal dka' mod //
NK016(ma)003:1833: nyams dang tshogs 'dres gyur pa bskangs so 'tshal //
NK016(ma)003:1834: blo sems rtul bas skyon can ma rtogs te //
NK016(ma)003:1835: rab gnong 'gyod pa'i sems kyis mthol bshags na //
NK016(ma)003:1836: grogs ngan nyams grib skyon gyis ma gos shing //
NK016(ma)003:1837: nyams pa rnam la chad pa sgor bcad de //
NK016(ma)003:1838: 'di phyi'i rkyen dang sgrib par mi 'gyur bar //
NK016(ma)003:1839: phra men sprul tshogs dbye bsal mdzad du gsol //
NK016(ma)003:1841: dri med rgyal po bshags pa'i rgyud las ye shes mkha' 'gro'i bshags pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o //
NK016(ma)003:1843: // de nas longs spyod chen po'i dam tshig la gnas
NK016(ma)003:1844: pa'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rnams kyis
NK016(ma)003:1845: chos nyid zhi ba'i bshags pa 'di gsungs so //
NK016(ma)003:1846: kun bzung yab yum gsan cing dgongs su gsol //
NK016(ma)003:1847: yid dang chos ni ye nas mngon sangs rgyas //
NK016(ma)003:1848: kun bzang yab yum dgongs spyod de 'dra yang //
NK016(ma)003:1849: de ltar bdag gis ma rig ma rtogs te //
NK016(ma)003:1850: kun bzang yab yum thugs dang ci 'gal ba //
NK016(ma)003:1851: thugs rje che mnga' khyed la bzod par gsol //
NK016(ma)003:1852: rgyal ba rigs lnga gsan cing dgongs su gsol //
NK016(ma)003:1853: phung po lnga ni ye nas mngon sangs rgyas //
NK016(ma)003:1854: rgyal ba rigs lnga'i dgongs spyod de 'dra yang //
NK016(ma)003:1855: de ltar bdag gis ma rig ma rtogs te //
NK016(ma)003:1856: rgyal ba rigs lnga'i thugs dang ci 'gal ba //
NK016(ma)003:1857: thugs rje che mnga' khyed la bzod par gsol //
NK016(ma)003:1858: rigs kyi yum rnams gsan cing dgongs su gsol //
NK016(ma)003:1859: 'byung ba lnga ni ye nas mngon sangs rgyas //
NK016(ma)003:1860: rigs kyi yum lnga'i dgongs spyod de 'dra yang //
NK016(ma)003:1861: de ltar bdag gis ma rig ma rtogs te //
NK016(ma)003:1862: rigs kyi yum lnga'i thugs dang ci 'gal ba //
NK016(ma)003:1863: thugs rje che mnga' khyed la bzod par gsol //
NK016(ma)003:1864: sems dpa' brgyad rnams gsan cing dgongs su gsol //
NK016(ma)003:1865: rnam shes brgyad ni ye nas mngon sangs rgyas //
NK016(ma)003:1866: sems dpa' brgyad kyi dgongs spyod de 'dra yang //
NK016(ma)003:1867: de ltar bdag gis ma rig ma rtogs te //
NK016(ma)003:1868: sems dpa' brgyad kyi thugs dang ci 'gal ba //
NK016(ma)003:1869: thugs rje che mnga' khyed la bzod par gsol //
NK016(ma)003:1870: sems ma brgyad rnams gsan cing dgongs su gsol //
NK016(ma)003:1871: yul bzhi dus bzhi ye nas mngon sangs rgyas //
NK016(ma)003:1872: sems ma brgyad kyi dgongs spyod de 'dra yang //
NK016(ma)003:1873: de ltar bdag gis ma rig ma rtogs te //
NK016(ma)003:1874: sems ma brgyad kyi thugs dang ci 'gal ba //
NK016(ma)003:1875: thugs rje che mnga' khyed la bzod par gsol //
NK016(ma)003:1876: thub pa drug rnams gsan cing dgongs su gsol //
NK016(ma)003:1877: nyon mongs drug ni ye nas mngon sangs rgyas //
NK016(ma)003:1878: thub pa drug gi dgongs spyod de 'dra yang //
NK016(ma)003:1879: de ltar bdag gis ma rig ma rtogs te //
NK016(ma)003:1880: thub pa drug gi thugs dang ci 'gal ba //
NK016(ma)003:1881: thugs rje che mnga' khyed la bzod par gsol //
NK016(ma)003:1882: sgo ba bzhi rnams gsan cing dgongs su gsol //
NK016(ma)003:1883: tshad med bzhi ni ye nas mngon sangs rgyas //
NK016(ma)003:1884: sgo ba bzhi yi dgongs spyod de 'dra yang //
NK016(ma)003:1885: de ltar bdag gis ma rig ma rtogs te //
NK016(ma)003:1886: sgo ba bzhi yi thugs dang ci 'gal ba //
NK016(ma)003:1887: thugs rje che mnga' khyed la bzod par gsol //
NK016(ma)003:1888: sgo ma bzhi rnams gsan cing dgongs su gsol //
NK016(ma)003:1889: rtag chad mu bzhi ye nas mngon sangs rgyas //
NK016(ma)003:1890: sgo ma bzhi yi dgongs spyod de 'dra yang //
NK016(ma)003:1891: de ltar bdag gis ma rigs ma rtogs te //
NK016(ma)003:1892: sgo ma bzhi yi thugs dang ci 'gal ba //
NK016(ma)003:1893: thugs rje che mnga' khyed la bzod par gsol //
NK016(ma)003:1895: de nas rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs rnams kyis zhi ba'i bshags pa 'di gsungs so //
NK016(ma)003:1897: / rang rig ye shes blo dang mi ldan pas //
NK016(ma)003:1898: bdag gis phung po khams dang skye mched rnams //
NK016(ma)003:1899: zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor lha ru sbyor ma 'tshal //
NK016(ma)003:1900: sangs rgyas bzhi bcu gnyis la bzod par gsol //
NK016(ma)003:1901: rang rig ye shes blo dang mi ldan pas //
NK016(ma)003:1902: yid chos kun bzang yab yum sbyor ma 'tshal //
NK016(ma)003:1903: ma rig rang sems bdag tu bzung bas nongs //
NK016(ma)003:1904: kun bzang yab yum sku la bzod par gsol //
NK016(ma)003:1905: rang rig ye shes blo dang mi ldan pas //
NK016(ma)003:1906: phung po lnga po rig lngar sbyor ma 'tshal //
NK016(ma)003:1907: ma rig rang sems bdag tu bzung bas nongs //
NK016(ma)003:1908: rgyal ba rigs lnga'i sku la bzod par gsol //
NK016(ma)003:1909: rang rig ye shes blo dang mi ldan pas //
NK016(ma)003:1910: 'byung ba lnga rnams yum lngar sbyor ma 'tshal //
NK016(ma)003:1911: ma rig rang sems bdag tu bzung bas nongs //
NK016(ma)003:1912: rigs kyi yum lnga'i sku la bzod par gsol //
NK016(ma)003:1913: rang rig ye shes blo dang mi ldan pas //
NK016(ma)003:1914: shes bzhi dbang bzhi sems dpar sbyor ma mtshal //
NK016(ma)003:1915: ma rig rang sems bdag tu bzung bas nongs //
NK016(ma)003:1916: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs la bzod par gsol //
NK016(ma)003:1917: rang rig ye shes blo dang mi ldan pas //
NK016(ma)003:1918: yul bzhi dus bzhi sems mar sbyor ma 'tshal //
NK016(ma)003:1919: ma rig rang sems bdag tu bzung bas nongs //
NK016(ma)003:1920: byang chub sems ma'i tshogs la bzod par gsol //
NK016(ma)003:1921: rang rig ye shes blo dang mi ldan pas //
NK016(ma)003:1922: nyon mongs drug po thub par sbyor ma 'tshal //
NK016(ma)003:1923: ma rig rang sems bdag tu bzung bas nongs //
NK016(ma)003:1924: thub drug sprul pa'i sku la bzod par gsol //
NK016(ma)003:1925: rang rig ye shes blo dang mi ldan pas //
NK016(ma)003:1926: reg sogs rnam bzhi sgo bar sbyor ma 'tshal //
NK016(ma)003:1927: ma rig rang sems bdag tu bzung bas nongs //
NK016(ma)003:1928: sgo skyong khro bo bzhi la bzod par gsol //
NK016(ma)003:1929: rang rig ye shes blo dang mi ldan pas //
NK016(ma)003:1930: rtag chad mu bzhi sgo mar sbyor ma 'tshal //
NK016(ma)003:1931: ma rig rang sems bdag tu bzung bas nongs //
NK016(ma)003:1932: sgo skyong khro mo bzhi la bzod par gsol //
NK016(ma)003:1933: rang rig ye shes blo dang mi ldan pas //
NK016(ma)003:1934: ma rig dbang gis 'khrul pas nongs bgyis pa //
NK016(ma)003:1935: nyon mongs las kyis yi dam lha spangs te //
NK016(ma)003:1936: slu byed dbang gis slob dpon snying nas smad //
NK016(ma)003:1937: nga rgyal dregs pas mched dang lcam dral dkrugs //
NK016(ma)003:1938: srab la 'phyar bas gsang sngags gzhan la spel //
NK016(ma)003:1939: ser sna'i dbang gis mchod pa dus las 'das //
NK016(ma)003:1940: grogs ngan skyon gyis gsang ba'i cho ga chag /
NK016(ma)003:1941: brtul zhugs chung bas bgegs srin tshar ma chod //
NK016(ma)003:1942: rngam zhing thug thub lhag phud nyams la sogs //
NK016(ma)003:1943: tshe rabs thog ma med pa'i dus mtha' nas //
NK016(ma)003:1944: tshe 'di'i lus bzung da lta yan chod du //
NK016(ma)003:1945: sdig pa mi dge'i las rnams ci bgyis pa //
NK016(ma)003:1946: dus rig dus mkhyen khyed la bzod par gsol //
NK016(ma)003:1947: 'phags pa lags pas khyed kyis dang du bzhes //
NK016(ma)003:1948: sems can lags pas bdag nongs 'khrul pa mchis //
NK016(ma)003:1949: sgyu ma lags pas bshags na gnang bar mdzod //
NK016(ma)003:1950: thabs la mkhas pas tshangs pa stsal du gsol //
NK016(ma)003:1952: de nas phyogs bcu nas lhags pa'i rnal 'byor gyi
NK016(ma)003:1953: dbang phyug chen po yab yum thams cad kyis zhi
NK016(ma)003:1954: ba'i lha tshogs la bshags pa 'di gsungs so //
NK016(ma)003:1955: kun tu bzang po thugs mchog rin po che //
NK016(ma)003:1956: khams gsum dbang du sdud pa yab lags shing //
NK016(ma)003:1957: don dam dbyings su sdud pa yum lags kyi //
NK016(ma)003:1958: bdag lus sgyu mar ma rtogs sku bslus shing //
NK016(ma)003:1959: bdag cag nyams chag sems la 'gyod pa skyes //
NK016(ma)003:1960: kun bzang yab yum sku la bzod par gsol //
NK016(ma)003:1961: rigs lnga sangs rgyas thugs mchog rin po che //
NK016(ma)003:1962: khams gsum dbang du sdud pa yab lags shing //
NK016(ma)003:1963: don dam dbyings su sdud pa yum lags kyi //
NK016(ma)003:1964: bdag lus sgyu mar ma rtogs sku bslus shing //
NK016(ma)003:1965: bdag cag nyams chag sems la 'gyod pa skyes //
NK016(ma)003:1966: rigs lnga yab yum sku la bzod par gsol //
NK016(ma)003:1967: sems dpa' sems ma thugs mchog rin po che //
NK016(ma)003:1968: khams gsum dbang du sdud pa yab lags shing //
NK016(ma)003:1969: don dam dbyings su sdud pa yum lags kyi //
NK016(ma)003:1970: bdag lus sgyu mar ma rtogs sku bslus shing //
NK016(ma)003:1971: bdag cag nyams chag sems la 'gyod pa skyes //
NK016(ma)003:1972: sems dpa' sems ma'i sku la bzod par gsol //
NK016(ma)003:1973: sprul sku thub drug sku mchog rin po che //
NK016(ma)003:1974: bcud kyi sems can khams gsum dbang du sdud //
NK016(ma)003:1975: snod kyi 'jig rten don dam dbyings su sbyor //
NK016(ma)003:1976: bdag lus sgyur mar ma rtogs sku bslus shing //
NK016(ma)003:1977: bdag cag nyams chag sems la 'gyod pa skyes //
NK016(ma)003:1978: sprul sku thub pa drug la bzod par gsol //
NK016(ma)003:1979: sgo ba sgo ma thugs mchog rin po che //
NK016(ma)003:1980: khams gsum dbang du sdud pa yab lags shing //
NK016(ma)003:1981: don dam dbyings su sdud pa yum lags kyi //
NK016(ma)003:1982: bdag lus sgyu mar ma rtogs sku bslus shing //
NK016(ma)003:1983: bdag cag nyams chag sems la 'gyod pa skyes //
NK016(ma)003:1984: sgo ba sgo ma rnams la bzod par gsol //
NK016(ma)003:1986: dri med rgyal po bshags pa'i rgyud las /
NK016(ma)003:1987: chos nyid zhi ba'i bshags pa ste le'u dgu pa'o //
NK016(ma)003:1989: // de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
NK016(ma)003:1990: dam tshig la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug
NK016(ma)003:1992: khro bo'i dkyil 'khor la bshags pa 'di 'gro ba'i don du gsungs so //
NK016(ma)003:1994: / dang po rang bzhin mnyam pa'i dkyil 'khor du //
NK016(ma)003:1995: gzung 'dzin gnyis kyi bdag dang ma bral bas //
NK016(ma)003:1996: gnyis su med pa'i gnas lugs don ma rtogs //
NK016(ma)003:1997: gnyis med chos kyi sku la bzod par gsol //
NK016(ma)003:1998: don dam mi 'gags gsal ba'i go 'byed pa'i //
NK016(ma)003:1999: zla gsal dwangs pa'i dbyings su sku bzhengs la //
NK016(ma)003:2000: byang chub thig le'i 'od kyis khyab mdzad pa //
NK016(ma)003:2001: kun snang dang ba'i sku la bzod par gsol //
NK016(ma)003:2002: don dam skye ba med pa'i mkha' dbyings las //
NK016(ma)003:2003: 'bras bu yon tan 'byung ba'i skur snang ba //
NK016(ma)003:2004: dbang chen rim gyis bskyed pa'i bzhugs gnas rten //
NK016(ma)003:2005: dbang chen gzhal yas gsal bar ma gyur pa //
NK016(ma)003:2006: pho brang 'bar ba'i klong du bzod par gsol //
NK016(ma)003:2007: bde chen nyid las phyag rgya'i skur snang zhing //
NK016(ma)003:2008: ye shes drug gi phyag mtshan rang rang bsnams //
NK016(ma)003:2009: ji ltar gsal ba'i ngang du ma gyur pa //
NK016(ma)003:2010: 'jigs byed he ru ka la bzod par gsol //
NK016(ma)003:2011: gnyis med sku la 'khril ba'i gzungs mchog ma //
NK016(ma)003:2012: pad+ma'i don la chags pa'i mkha' dbyings su //
NK016(ma)003:2013: gnyis med byang chub sems kyi 'od spro ba //
NK016(ma)003:2014: kro d+h+ai shwa r+ai'i sku la bzod par gsol //
NK016(ma)003:2015: thugs las skyes pa'i ye shes khro mo rnams //
NK016(ma)003:2016: rnam shes dur khrod brgyad kyi mkha' 'gro ma //
NK016(ma)003:2017: goo r+ai la sogs thugs dang ci 'gal ba //
NK016(ma)003:2018: gnas kyi ma brgyad sku la bzod par gsol //
NK016(ma)003:2019: thugs rje zhi ba'i ngang las ma g.yos kyang //
NK016(ma)003:2020: log rtog mtshan mar 'dzin pa zhi ba'i phyir //
NK016(ma)003:2021: mche gshog rngams pa 'bar ba'i skur sprul pa //
NK016(ma)003:2022: sing+ha la sogs thugs dang ci 'gal ba //
NK016(ma)003:2023: yul gyi phra men brgyad la bzod par gsol //
NK016(ma)003:2024: pho brang rgyan dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor du /
NK016(ma)003:2025: 'gugs dang 'ching dang sdom dgyes sgo ma bzhi //
NK016(ma)003:2026: rta gdong la sogs thugs dang ci 'gal ba //
NK016(ma)003:2027: sgo bzhi phyag rgya rnams la bzod par gsol //
NK016(ma)003:2028: mngon spyod las las grub pa'i dbang phyug ma //
NK016(ma)003:2029: dge dang mi dge gnyis kyi dbang mdzad pa'i //
NK016(ma)003:2030: ma tshogs dbang phyug thugs dang ci 'gal ba //
NK016(ma)003:2031: ma sring rgya mtsho rnams la bzod par gsol //
NK016(ma)003:2032: rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor du //
NK016(ma)003:2033: thugs rje mnyam pa'i ngang las ma g.yos kyang //
NK016(ma)003:2034: phra mo'i ting 'dzin gsal bar ma gyur pas //
NK016(ma)003:2035: yon tan 'dzin pa rnams la bzod par gsol //
NK016(ma)003:2036: bdag gis skye ba thog ma ma mchis nas //
NK016(ma)003:2037: da lta'i lus 'di bzung ba yan chad du //
NK016(ma)003:2038: ma rig dbang gis srid pa'i khams kun 'khor //
NK016(ma)003:2039: ji srid mi lus blangs nas gar skyes kyang /
NK016(ma)003:2040: mtshams med lnga dang de dang nye ba lnga //
NK016(ma)003:2041: sdig pa'i las su gyur pa ci mchis pa //
NK016(ma)003:2042: dngos gyis bgyis dang bgyid du stsal ba dang //
NK016(ma)003:2043: de la rjes su yi rang bgyis pa rnams //
NK016(ma)003:2044: byang chub thugs rjes bdag la dgongs nas kyang //
NK016(ma)003:2045: tshangs par mdzad nas dngos grub stsal du gsol //
NK016(ma)003:2047: de nas dam tshig la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rnams kyis 'di gsungs so //
NK016(ma)003:2049: bskal pa dus mtha'i me ltar 'bar ba'i klong //
NK016(ma)003:2050: dug lnga gnas gyur ye shes he ru ka /
NK016(ma)003:2051: dbyings kyi yum chen khro mo lnga dang sbyor //
NK016(ma)003:2052: goo r+ai la sogs nang gi mkha' 'gro bzhi //
NK016(ma)003:2053: puk+ka la sogs phyi yi rnal 'byor ma //
NK016(ma)003:2054: sid+ha la sogs za byed gdong can tshogs //
NK016(ma)003:2055: kri ta la sogs mtshams kyi gshog pa can //
NK016(ma)003:2056: 'bar ba'i bar khyams dbang phyug nyi shu brgyad //
NK016(ma)003:2057: sgo bzhi 'gugs 'ching sdom dgyes sgo ma bzhi //
NK016(ma)003:2058: khrag 'thung lha tshogs sku yang ma gsal zhing //
NK016(ma)003:2059: snying po grangs nyung phyag rgya gnas ma son //
NK016(ma)003:2060: tshogs dang 'byor pas gnas su ma bskangs pa //
NK016(ma)003:2061: khro bo'i lha tshogs rnams la bzod par gsol //
NK016(ma)003:2063: de nas yang phyogs bcu'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug pho mo rnams kyis /
NK016(ma)003:2064: he ru ka'i dkyil 'khor la bshags pa 'di gsungs so //
NK016(ma)003:2066: / dang por gsang mchog sdom pa 'di mnos nas //
NK016(ma)003:2067: 'da' dka' khas blangs dam las g.yel gyur te //
NK016(ma)003:2068: khrag 'thung rigs lnga'i thugs dang ci 'gal ba //
NK016(ma)003:2069: thugs rje che mnga' khyed la bzod par gsol //
NK016(ma)003:2070: ga na'i sbyor mchog rtog 'dzin bar chad kyis //
NK016(ma)003:2071: yum chen kro d+h+ai'i thugs dang ci 'gal ba //
NK016(ma)003:2072: khro mo dbyings phyug lnga la bzod par gsol //
NK016(ma)003:2073: rdzas dang phyag rgya mngon du ma gyur te //
NK016(ma)003:2074: sha za goo r+ai'i thugs dang ci 'gal ba //
NK016(ma)003:2075: gnas kyi ma brgyad sku la bzod par gsol //
NK016(ma)003:2076: sha khrag mchod pa gzhung bzhin ma 'tshogs te //
NK016(ma)003:2077: sid+ha phra men thugs dang ci 'gal ba //
NK016(ma)003:2078: yul gyi mkha' 'gro'i sku la bzod par gsol //
NK016(ma)003:2079: shar lho nub byang sgo bzhi ma phyed de //
NK016(ma)003:2080: rta gdong sgo ma'i thugs dang ci 'gal ba //
NK016(ma)003:2081: ye shes sgo ma bzhi la bzod par gsol //
NK016(ma)003:2082: 'da' dka' khas blangs 'khor drug ma thul te //
NK016(ma)003:2083: ma bdun sring bzhi'i thugs dang ci 'gal ba //
NK016(ma)003:2084: mkha' 'gro bcu gcig sku la bzod par gsol //
NK016(ma)003:2085: longs sbyod 'byams nas tshogs kyi phud nyams te //
NK016(ma)003:2086: phud myul dbang phyug thugs dang ci 'gal ba //
NK016(ma)003:2087: dbang mo nyi shu brgyad la bzod par gsol //
NK016(ma)003:2088: gnas la ma brten bya byed 'byung 'jug gis //
NK016(ma)003:2089: ti ra'i gnas myul thugs dang ci 'gal ba //
NK016(ma)003:2090: gnas myul chen mo'i sku la bzod par gsol //
NK016(ma)003:2091: sku mnyes pha ma'i tshul du ma gyur te //
NK016(ma)003:2092: rdo rje slob dpon thugs dang ci 'gal ba //
NK016(ma)003:2093: rdo rje rgyal po'i sku la bzod par gsol //
NK016(ma)003:2094: ting 'dzin ma snyems zhi khro ma phyed de //
NK016(ma)003:2095: rdo rje rgyal thebs thugs dang ci 'gal ba //
NK016(ma)003:2096: ston pa sgron me'i sku la bzod par gsol //
NK016(ma)003:2097: le lo byas pas phyag rgya rgyun chad de //
NK016(ma)003:2098: karma las mkhan thugs dang ci 'gal ba //
NK016(ma)003:2099: las gyi slob dpon sku la bzod par gsol //
NK016(ma)003:2100: sbyor ba'i tshe na tshad la ma phebs te //
NK016(ma)003:2101: shes rab snyems ma'i thugs dang ci 'gal ba //
NK016(ma)003:2102: gsang yum rig ma'i sku la bzod par gsol //
NK016(ma)003:2103: sgrol ba'i tshe na ting 'dzin gnas ma stob //
NK016(ma)003:2104: skyes bu ging chen thugs dang ci 'gal ba //
NK016(ma)003:2105: sgrol ging bdag po'i sku la bzod par gsol //
NK016(ma)003:2106: sprul sku khro mo'i thugs su ma gyur te //
NK016(ma)003:2107: 'gugs 'dren pho nya'i thugs dang ci 'gal ba //
NK016(ma)003:2108: mgyogs byed las mdzad sku la bzod par gsol //
NK016(ma)003:2109: le lo dbang gis brtse gdung rgyun chad de //
NK016(ma)003:2110: byang chub mched lcam thugs dang ci 'gal ba //
NK016(ma)003:2111: rdzo rje ming sring sku la bzod par gsol //
NK016(ma)003:2112: bre mo'i phyir na dam tshig nyams la sogs //
NK016(ma)003:2113: phyi nang rjes gcod thugs dang ci 'gal ba //
NK016(ma)003:2114: dam tshig bya ra byed la bzod par gsol //
NK016(ma)003:2115: longs spyod gsol nas lhag ma'i phud nyams te //
NK016(ma)003:2116: phyi 'khor brtan ma'i thugs dang ci 'gal ba //
NK016(ma)003:2117: thugs rje che mnga' khyed la bzod par gsol //
NK016(ma)003:2118: bzod par mdzad nas tshangs pa'i dngos grub stsol //
NK016(ma)003:2119: dri med rgyal po bshags pa'i rgyud las //
NK016(ma)003:2120: khro bo'i dkyil 'khor khrag 'thung la bshags pa ste le'u bcu pa'o //
NK016(ma)003:2122: // de nas yang dpal chen po he ru ka la
NK016(ma)003:2123: sogs pa'i dam tshig la gnas pa'i gtso 'khor rnams
NK016(ma)003:2125: thugs rje chen po bcom ldan rdo rje sems //
NK016(ma)003:2126: dri med dung mdog mchog tu gzugs bzang ba //
NK016(ma)003:2127: rnam dag 'od gsal zla 'od dkyil na mdzes //
NK016(ma)003:2128: ji ltar mkha' la nyi 'od 'bum rdal bzhin //
NK016(ma)003:2129: dpa' bo 'od zer stong 'bar lham me ba //
NK016(ma)003:2130: srid pa gsum gyi sa mkhan ston par grags //
NK016(ma)003:2131: khams gsum 'gro ba kun gyi gnyen gcig pu //
NK016(ma)003:2132: byams mgon thugs rje'i lha khyod dgongs su gsol //
NK016(ma)003:2133: bdag ni thogs ma med pa'i dus mtha' nas //
NK016(ma)003:2134: la ma log lam stor srid pa'i 'khor bar 'khyams //
NK016(ma)003:2135: sngon tshe las log sdig pa spyad pas nongs //
NK016(ma)003:2136: sdig pa'i las rnams ci byas rab gnong 'gyod //
NK016(ma)003:2137: dar zhing drags pa'i las dbang de btsan pas //
NK016(ma)003:2138: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rgya mtshor byings gyur te //
NK016(ma)003:2139: zhe sdang 'bar ba'i mes ni rang rgyud bsregs //
NK016(ma)003:2140: gti mug mun pa 'thibs pas shes rab ldongs //
NK016(ma)003:2141: 'dod chags rgya 'tsho'i 'gram du rnam shes byings //
NK016(ma)003:2142: nga rgyal dregs pa'i ri bos ngan 'gro mnan //
NK016(ma)003:2143: phrag dog rlung dmar 'tshubs pas 'khor bar g.yengs //
NK016(ma)003:2144: bdag tu blta ba'i mdud pa dam pos bcings //
NK016(ma)003:2145: 'dod pa me mdag dong 'dra'i 'obs su lhung //
NK016(ma)003:2146: sdug bsngal drag po mi bzad char ltar 'bab //
NK016(ma)003:2147: 'di 'dra'i sdug bsngal shin tu bzod dka' zhing //
NK016(ma)003:2148: sdig pa'i las dbang drag po me 'bar bas //
NK016(ma)003:2149: rnam shes dbang po'i myu gu gdungs gyur te //
NK016(ma)003:2150: phyung po sgyu ma'i lus kyis mi bzod na //
NK016(ma)003:2151: byams mgon thugs rje can gyis bzod lags sam //
NK016(ma)003:2152: bdag 'dra blun rmongs las ngan sdig po che //
NK016(ma)003:2153: las kyi dbang gis 'dod khams r+au trar skyes //
NK016(ma)003:2154: skyes pas 'gyod do las la yi re chad //
NK016(ma)003:2155: yi chad 'gyod kyang las la bcos su med //
NK016(ma)003:2156: las kyi shugs ni chu bo'i rgyun dang 'dra //
NK016(ma)003:2157: las dbang chu klung 'phral du ga la ldog /
NK016(ma)003:2158: rnam smin thams cad rang gi las las byung //
NK016(ma)003:2159: bka' la zhugs kyang bka' bzhin rngo ma thogs //
NK016(ma)003:2160: lus ngag yid gsum sdig pa'i dbang du song //
NK016(ma)003:2161: las kyi rlung dmar drag po des bdas pas //
NK016(ma)003:2162: bdag ni de sngon bskal pa grangs med du //
NK016(ma)003:2163: 'khor ba'i btson ra mun par 'khyams pa la //
NK016(ma)003:2164: nye gnas khyed kyi thugs rje'i byin rlabs kyis //
NK016(ma)003:2165: las dang nyon mongs sgrib pa'i gnas sbyangs nas //
NK016(ma)003:2166: ma ltar byams pa'i zhabs drung da lta 'khod //
NK016(ma)003:2167: nyi ltar 'od 'bar zla ltar mdangs gsal ba'i //
NK016(ma)003:2168: thugs rje'i zhal nyid blta bas mi ngoms pa //
NK016(ma)003:2169: thog ma med nas ma rig ling tog gis //
NK016(ma)003:2170: ldongs ba'i chu bur mig gis ma mthong na //
NK016(ma)003:2171: 'gro ba'i mgon khyod de sngon gang na bzhugs //
NK016(ma)003:2172: las dbang drag po rab tu mi bzad pas //
NK016(ma)003:2173: shin tu skrag cing skyi g.ya' rab 'jig nas //
NK016(ma)003:2174: dung dung gdung ba'i smre sngags 'di 'don cing //
NK016(ma)003:2175: nyams thag phongs pa'i nga ros 'bod lags na //
NK016(ma)003:2176: byams mgon thugs rjes dus 'dir ma dgongs na //
NK016(ma)003:2177: nam zhig 'chi 'pho lus sems 'bral ba'i tshe //
NK016(ma)003:2178: dge bshes grogs dang bral te gshin rjes khrid //
NK016(ma)003:2179: de tshe 'jig rten nye dus mi stongs te //
NK016(ma)003:2180: las kyi dbang gis bdag nyid gcig pur 'khyams //
NK016(ma)003:2181: dus der bdag la mgon skyabs ma mchis na //
NK016(ma)003:2182: gang gis phyi bshol dus las ma bzhes par //
NK016(ma)003:2183: da lta nyid du brtun te mngon spyod mdzod //
NK016(ma)003:2184: las kyi mnar ba'i skye bo bdag 'dra ba //
NK016(ma)003:2185: thog ma med pa'i dus nas log brtags pas //
NK016(ma)003:2186: khams gsum 'khor ba'i gnas las ma thar te //
NK016(ma)003:2187: bskal pa grangs med skye ba ji snyed du //
NK016(ma)003:2188: gdos bcas lus blangs grangs med zhig gyur te //
NK016(ma)003:2189: sha rus bsags na 'jig rten gtos dang mnyam //
NK016(ma)003:2190: rnag khrag bsags na rgya mtsho chen po tsam //
NK016(ma)003:2191: las 'phro bsags na bsam 'das brjod mi lang //
NK016(ma)003:2192: khams gsum bgrangs shing skye shi'i kha brgyud kyang //
NK016(ma)003:2193: byas pa'i las rnams don med chud re zos //
NK016(ma)003:2194: skye ba grangs med ji snyed de tsam gyi //
NK016(ma)003:2195: skye ba gcig gcig kho na tsam gyi las //
NK016(ma)003:2196: bla med byang chub don du rab spyad na //
NK016(ma)003:2197: de tsam byas pa'i las la don rab yod //
NK016(ma)003:2198: don gyi yang ye mya ngan 'das zin na //
NK016(ma)003:2199: las kyi dbang btsan nyon mongs stobs che bas //
NK016(ma)003:2200: sha khrag 'dus pa'i lus blangs 'khor bar 'khyams //
NK016(ma)003:2201: sdug bsngal bzod dka' srid pa'i btson rar tshud //
NK016(ma)003:2202: mi bzad drag po'i sdug bsngal 'di lta bu //
NK016(ma)003:2203: nyes byas thams cad rang gi las las byung //
NK016(ma)003:2204: sdig pa'i las rnams byams mgon khyed la bshags //
NK016(ma)003:2205: thugs rje chen pos las ngan rgyun bcad de //
NK016(ma)003:2206: nyon mongs las kyi rlung 'di bzlog tu gsol //
NK016(ma)003:2207: ma rig log pa'i las kyi dbang mtshan pas //
NK016(ma)003:2208: mi shes mun pa'i nang du gtan 'khyams na //
NK016(ma)003:2209: ye shes sgron me'i zer gyis mi stongs sam //
NK016(ma)003:2210: nyes byas las kyi rnam smin ma bzod na //
NK016(ma)003:2211: thugs rje chen pos phrin las mi mdzad dam //
NK016(ma)003:2212: phyin ci log gi g.yang sar lhung lags na //
NK016(ma)003:2213: thugs rje myur mgyogs phyag gis mi 'dzin nam //
NK016(ma)003:2214: dug gsum bzod daka'i nad kyis gdungs lags na //
NK016(ma)003:2215: thabs mkhas thugs rje'i sman gyis mi gaso'am //
NK016(ma)003:2216: las kyi rnam smin sdug bsngal me 'bar na //
NK016(ma)003:2217: thugs rje bsil ba'i chu rgyun mi 'bebs sam //
NK016(ma)003:2218: sdug bsngal 'khor ba'i 'dam du byings gyur na //
NK016(ma)003:2219: thabs mkhas thugs rje'i lcags kyus mi 'dren nam //
NK016(ma)003:2220: khams gsum 'khor ba'i gnas su sbyangs sbyangs nas //
NK016(ma)003:2221: nam zhig rang gis 'bras bu thob pa'i tshe //
NK016(ma)003:2222: 'phags pa'i thugs rjes ci 'tshal don ma mchis //
NK016(ma)003:2223: bdag nyid las 'phro'i dbang btsan bzhag na lta //
NK016(ma)003:2224: thugs rje che zhes su la ci zhig bgyi //
NK016(ma)003:2225: dpa' bo khyod la thug rje'i stobs mnga' zhing //
NK016(ma)003:2226: sngon byung 'brel ba'i las kyi 'phro btsan na //
NK016(ma)003:2227: yal yol btang snyoms le lo ma mdzad par //
NK016(ma)003:2228: snying nas da gzigs thugs rje rgyal ba'i lha //
NK016(ma)003:2229: zhes dregs pa can rnams kyis bshags so //
NK016(ma)003:2230: dri med rgyal po bshags pa'i rgyud las //
NK016(ma)003:2231: r+au tra'i smre bshags te le 'u bcu gcig pa'o //
NK016(ma)003:2233: // de nas bcom ldan 'das longs spyod kyi bdag po chen po rnams kyis /
NK016(ma)003:2234: rgyud lung man ngag gi bshags pa 'di gsungs so //
NK016(ma)003:2235: chos nyid dus gsum spros pa med pa la //
NK016(ma)003:2236: 'dzin rtog med pa'i rang rig ye shes kyis //
NK016(ma)003:2237: dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med pa las //
NK016(ma)003:2238: yul dang dbang po gnyis su med par bshags //
NK016(ma)003:2239: yum gyi b+ha ga dgyes pa'i pho brang du //
NK016(ma)003:2240: yab kyi rdo rje gnyis med byang chub sems //
NK016(ma)003:2241: thabs dang shes rab 'du 'bral med pa la //
NK016(ma)003:2242: phyi nang snod bcud gnyis su med par bshags //
NK016(ma)003:2243: ting 'dzin rnam gsum blo yi bdar bcad nas //
NK016(ma)003:2244: phung po rnam shes yul dang dbang po rnams //
NK016(ma)003:2245: lha dang lha mo'i dkyil 'khor gsal bsgoms nas //
NK016(ma)003:2246: 'gro drug sems can rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor du //
NK016(ma)003:2247: gnyis su med par lhun gyis grub par mdzod //
NK016(ma)003:2248: ces rgyud rnal 'byor chen po ltar bshags so //
NK016(ma)003:2249: de nas lung ltar bshags pa 'di gsungs so //
NK016(ma)003:2250: rtsa srog tsit+ta lus ngag yid gsum po //
NK016(ma)003:2251: gu h+ya gsang chen sku gsung thugs kyi mdzod //
NK016(ma)003:2252: rdo rje klong dgu dpal chen he ru ka /
NK016(ma)003:2253: khams gsum sa dgu gnyis su med par bshags //
NK016(ma)003:2254: ji ltar snang ba lha yi dkyil 'khor du //
NK016(ma)003:2255: snying po brjod pas sku mchog rdzogs pa'i tshul //
NK016(ma)003:2256: dbyer med mnyam nyid ngo bo nyid kyi sku //
NK016(ma)003:2257: thabs la mkhas pas gnyis su med par bshags //
NK016(ma)003:2258: phyi nang snod bcud gnyis med chos kyi sku //
NK016(ma)003:2259: nga dang bdag gi ngo bo nyid mnyam pas //
NK016(ma)003:2260: mtho ris ngan song rgyu 'bras rnam gnyis po //
NK016(ma)003:2261: gnyis med bde chen klong du mthar phyin shog /
NK016(ma)003:2262: ces lung rjes su rnal 'byor ltar bshags so //
NK016(ma)003:2263: de nas man ngag ltar bshags pa 'di gsungs so //
NK016(ma)003:2264: ji ltar snang ba kun bzang bde chen gnas //
NK016(ma)003:2265: yod med rtag chad mtshan ma'i tshig las 'das //
NK016(ma)003:2266: 'di ltar ma rtogs bdag nyid gang yin pa //
NK016(ma)003:2267: de nyid ma spangs rtogs pa'i klong du bshags //
NK016(ma)003:2268: dus gsum 'pho 'gyur tha tshig btags pa med //
NK016(ma)003:2269: rtsol med sgrub med nam mkha'i ngang du gnas //
NK016(ma)003:2270: yong la khyab pas kun gyis 'dod rgud sgyur //
NK016(ma)003:2271: phyin ci log rtog byang chub lam du bshags //
NK016(ma)003:2272: rtogs pa'i man ngag don du mi ldan na //
NK016(ma)003:2273: tshig gis mtshon pas byang chub mi 'thob ste //
NK016(ma)003:2274: rang sems ye nas sangs rgyas yin shes pas //
NK016(ma)003:2275: rang byung ye shes klong du mthar phyin shog /
NK016(ma)003:2276: de ltar bshags na sgrib pa thams cad dang //
NK016(ma)003:2277: nyon mongs las ngan ma spangs rang dag nas //
NK016(ma)003:2278: 'bras bu yang dag sangs rgyas 'thob bo zhes //
NK016(ma)003:2279: man ngag rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor ltar bshags so //
NK016(ma)003:2280: dri med rgyal po bshags pa'i rgyud las /
NK016(ma)003:2281: rgyud lung man ngag gi bshags pa ste le'u bcu gnyis pa'o //
NK016(ma)003:2283: // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sangs rgyas thams cad
NK016(ma)003:2284: kyi dgongs pa'i ngang nas lta ba'i klong bshags 'di
NK016(ma)003:2285: gsungs so // chos kyi dbyings nyid spros pa med pa la //
NK016(ma)003:2286: gzung 'dzin gnyis su blta ba yongs re gol //
NK016(ma)003:2287: dngos po mtshan mar 'dzin pa nyon re mongs //
NK016(ma)003:2288: spros med bde chen klong du bshags par bgyi //
NK016(ma)003:2289: kun tu bzang po bzang ngan med pa la //
NK016(ma)003:2290: bzang ngan gnyis su blta ba thang re chad //
NK016(ma)003:2291: gtsang dang sme bar 'dzin pa nyon re mongs //
NK016(ma)003:2292: bzang ngan med pa'i klong du bshags par bgyi //
NK016(ma)003:2293: mnyam pa nyid la che chung med pa la //
NK016(ma)003:2294: sangs rgyas sems can blta ba yongs re gol //
NK016(ma)003:2295: che chung gnyis su 'dzin pa nyon re mongs //
NK016(ma)003:2296: mnyam nyid bde chen klong du bshags bar bgyi //
NK016(ma)003:2297: byang chub sems la skye shi med pa la //
NK016(ma)003:2298: 'di dang phyi mar blta ba thang re chad //
NK016(ma)003:2299: skye shi gnyis su 'dzin pa nyon re mongs //
NK016(ma)003:2300: 'chi med g.yung drung klong du bshags par bgyi //
NK016(ma)003:2301: thig le chen po grwa zur med pa la //
NK016(ma)003:2302: gzugs dang rdzas su blta ba thang re chad //
NK016(ma)003:2303: grwa zur gnyis su 'dzin pa nyon re mongs //
NK016(ma)003:2304: kun nas zlum pa'i thig le chen por bshags //
NK016(ma)003:2305: dus gsum 'gyur ba med pa'i ngang nyid la //
NK016(ma)003:2306: thog ma tha mar blta ba yongs re gol //
NK016(ma)003:2307: 'pho 'gyur gnyis su 'dzin pa nyon re mongs //
NK016(ma)003:2308: 'gyur ba med pa'i thig le chen por bshags //
NK016(ma)003:2309: rang byung ye shes btsal du med pa la //
NK016(ma)003:2310: rgyu 'bras gnyis su blta ba thang re chad //
NK016(ma)003:2311: rtsol bsgrub gnyis su 'dzin pa nyon re mongs //
NK016(ma)003:2312: rtsol ba med pa'i rang byung klong du bshags //
NK016(ma)003:2313: rig pa'i ye shes rtag chad med pa la //
NK016(ma)003:2314: rtag chad gnyis su 'dzin pa snying re rje //
NK016(ma)003:2315: yod dang med par blta ba nyon re mongs //
NK016(ma)003:2316: rtag chad med pa'i ye shes klong du bshags //
NK016(ma)003:2317: chos dbyings rnam dag mtha' dbus med pa la //
NK016(ma)003:2318: phyogs ris mtha' dbus spro bsdu thang re chad //
NK016(ma)003:2319: mtha' dbus gnyis su 'dzin pa nyon re mongs //
NK016(ma)003:2320: chos dbyings rnam dag mtha' dbus med par bshags //
NK016(ma)003:2321: gzhal yas khang la phyi nang med pa la //
NK016(ma)003:2322: phyi dang nang du blta ba thang re chad //
NK016(ma)003:2323: yangs dog gnyis su 'dzin pa nyon re mongs //
NK016(ma)003:2324: yangs dog phyi nang med pa'i klong du bshags //
NK016(ma)003:2325: yum gyi mkha' dbyings mtho dma' med pa la //
NK016(ma)003:2326: steng 'og gnyis su blta ba snying re rje //
NK016(ma)003:2327: mtho dma' gnyis su 'dzin pa nyon re mongs //
NK016(ma)003:2328: b+ha ga yangs dog med pa'i klong du bshags //
NK016(ma)003:2329: chos kyi sku la dbye ba med pa la //
NK016(ma)003:2330: yul dang sems su blta ba thang re chad //
NK016(ma)003:2331: snod bcud gnyis su 'dzin pa nyon re mongs //
NK016(ma)003:2332: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes sku ru bshags //
NK016(ma)003:2333: rig pa'i ye shes nang nas ma shar bas //
NK016(ma)003:2334: ma rig rmongs pa'i blo 'di snying re rje //
NK016(ma)003:2335: gzugs med chos la dngos po mtshan mar 'dzin //
NK016(ma)003:2336: ye shes rang bzhin klong du mthol lo bshags //
NK016(ma)003:2337: skye ba med pa'i don de ma rtogs na //
NK016(ma)003:2338: gang zag 'khrul pa'i blo 'di yongs re gol //
NK016(ma)003:2339: skye med chos la nga dang bdag tu bzung /
NK016(ma)003:2340: bde chen skye med klong du mthol lo bshags //
NK016(ma)003:2341: chos nyid don de blo la ma gsal bas //
NK016(ma)003:2342: snang srid sgyu ma yin par ma shes te //
NK016(ma)003:2343: zang zing nor la chags pa'i sems ni skyes //
NK016(ma)003:2344: chos nyid skye med chags pa med par bshags //
NK016(ma)003:2345: 'khor ba rang bzhin med par ma shes pas //
NK016(ma)003:2346: dngos po mtshan ma'i chos la rtag par 'dzin /
NK016(ma)003:2347: mi dge'i las kyis bde ba 'tshol byed pa //
NK016(ma)003:2348: byung chub skyon bral klong du mthol lo bshags //
NK016(ma)003:2349: mnyam pa'i don nyid mnyam par ma rtogs pas //
NK016(ma)003:2350: gnyen bshes 'khrul ba'i grogs ni rtag par 'dzin //
NK016(ma)003:2351: mi shes skye bo'i sems 'di yongs re gol //
NK016(ma)003:2352: mnyam nyid choos nyid klong du mtho lo bshags //
NK016(ma)003:2353: chos nyid bden ba'i don dang ma phrad na //
NK016(ma)003:2354: bden pa'i don bor mi dge'i las la brtson //
NK016(ma)003:2355: ston pa'i bka' bor mi chos g.yeng bas bslus //
NK016(ma)003:2356: chos nyid bde chen klong du mthol lo bshags //
NK016(ma)003:2357: rig pa'i ye shes rang sar ma grol bas //
NK016(ma)003:2358: rang rig don bor g.yeng ba'i las la brtson //
NK016(ma)003:2359: 'di 'dra'i don med sems can snying re rje //
NK016(ma)003:2360: dbye bsri med pa'i klong du bshags par bgyi //
NK016(ma)003:2361: ye shes lha tshogs bsrung ma dam can rnams //
NK016(ma)003:2362: dam tshig gzhung bzhin grub pa'i rnam 'byor la //
NK016(ma)003:2363: ma rtogs lta ba'i gol sgrib byung ba na //
NK016(ma)003:2364: rab gnong 'gyod pa'i sems kyis mthol lo bshags //
NK016(ma)003:2365: dri med rgyal po bshags pa'i rgyud las //
NK016(ma)003:2366: grol lam lta ba'i bshags pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o //
NK016(ma)003:2368: // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis longs spyod chen po'i dam tshig la gnas pa rnams la //
NK016(ma)003:2369: thabs lam dbang gis yongs su rdzogs pa'i bshags pa 'di gsungs so //
NK016(ma)003:2371: / bdag lus gzhal yas khang du gnas pa'i nang //
NK016(ma)003:2372: spyi mgrin snying ga lte ba gsang gnas su //
NK016(ma)003:2373: dug lnga rnam dag rigs lnga yab yum sku //
NK016(ma)003:2374: bskyed rim dbyibs kyi lam du ma shes bshags //
NK016(ma)003:2375: lus sems ye nas zung 'jug gnas pa la //
NK016(ma)003:2376: snang phyogs stong phyogs zung 'jug ma shes te //
NK016(ma)003:2377: mnyam bzhag rjes thob nyams len skyong ma shes //
NK016(ma)003:2378: ngo bo nyid gsum lta ba'i klong du bshags //
NK016(ma)003:2379: ye nas 'khor 'das dbyer med yin pa la //
NK016(ma)003:2380: snod bcud gzhal yas khang dang lhar ma shes //
NK016(ma)003:2381: 'byung bzhi'i chos la mnga' dbang ma bsnyes pa //
NK016(ma)003:2382: grub mtha' 'khor 'das dbyer med ngang du bshags //
NK016(ma)003:2383: ye nas skye shi med par ma shes pas //
NK016(ma)003:2384: ma rtogs 'chi dus snang ba bsgyur ba dang //
NK016(ma)003:2385: 'od kyi gong bu sgra yis 'pho ma shes //
NK016(ma)003:2386: 'da' kha 'chi brod ngang du bshags par bgyi //
NK016(ma)003:2387: lus kyi rtsa yi gtso bo phal pa rnams //
NK016(ma)003:2388: ye nas sprul skur gnas pa ma shes te //
NK016(ma)003:2389: dbyibs kyi lha sku rang gsal bsgom ma shes //
NK016(ma)003:2390: sprul sku'i rang bzhin lhun grub 'bras bur bshags //
NK016(ma)003:2391: lus rtsa bum pa'i dbang du ma shes pas //
NK016(ma)003:2392: ma h+aa yo ga'i bskyed rim bsgom ma nus //
NK016(ma)003:2393: bum dbang dam tshig nyams pa 'thol lo bshags //
NK016(ma)003:2394: tshangs par gyur nas bskyed rim dngos grub stsol //
NK016(ma)003:2395: zhes phyi'i dbang gi bshags pa de skad gsungs so //
NK016(ma)003:2396: de nas gsang dbang gi bshags pa 'di gsungs so //
NK016(ma)003:2397: lus gnas yi ge longs skur gnas pa la //
NK016(ma)003:2398: 'khor lo rten dang ma rten man ngag gnad //
NK016(ma)003:2399: bde ba nyams su len pa'i lam ma bsgoms //
NK016(ma)003:2400: bdag la byin rlabs lam gyi ngang du bshags //
NK016(ma)003:2401: nyon mongs dang ni rnam rtog s+n+rel gzhi rnams //
NK016(ma)003:2402: gsal zhing yangs pa'i rang byung ye shes gnas //
NK016(ma)003:2403: snying gar ro rkyang dbu ma zung 'jug bde //
NK016(ma)003:2404: lta ba rang byung ye shes klong du bshags //
NK016(ma)003:2405: sgra dbyangs ye nas skad du gnas pa la //
NK016(ma)003:2406: 'gro ba rigs drug so so'i rang skad dang //
NK016(ma)003:2407: gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis yin ma shes //
NK016(ma)003:2408: grub mtha' ma 'dres yongs rdzogs ngang du bshags //
NK016(ma)003:2409: sems kyi 'od gsal ye nas 'du 'bral med //
NK016(ma)003:2410: ma bsgoms rang chas yin par ma shes pas //
NK016(ma)003:2411: 'chi dus rang gsal 'byung bar ma 'tshal ba //
NK016(ma)003:2412: 'da' kha'i gdams ngag 'od gsal ngang du bshags //
NK016(ma)003:2413: lus gnas yi ge longs skur gnas pa la //
NK016(ma)003:2414: lam du ma shes bde ba ma bsgoms pas //
NK016(ma)003:2415: gtum mo'i drod kyi 'bras bu ma thob pa //
NK016(ma)003:2416: 'bras su longs spyod rdzogs pa'i ngang du bshags //
NK016(ma)003:2417: gsang ba dbang gi gdams ngag shes gyur kyang //
NK016(ma)003:2418: rang gi bde ba lam du ma longs te //
NK016(ma)003:2419: gtum mo'i drod rtags lus la ma shar ba //
NK016(ma)003:2420: gsang dbang dam tshig nyams pa mthol lo bshags //
NK016(ma)003:2421: zhes nang gi gsang dbang gi bshags pa de skad gsungs so //
NK016(ma)003:2422: de nas shes rab ye shes kyi dbang gi bshags pa 'di gsungs so //
NK016(ma)003:2423: lus khams bdud rtsi rang la gnas pa la //
NK016(ma)003:2424: yum bdag 'dod pa'i byin rlabs mnyam pa dang //
NK016(ma)003:2425: sbyor ba dngos gzhi rjes kyi bsdus rgyas rnams //
NK016(ma)003:2426: ma bsgoms 'khor lo thabs kyi lam du bshags //
NK016(ma)003:2427: bde ba ye nas rang la gnas pa la //
NK016(ma)003:2428: go rim gnas dang spang bya ngo bo yi //
NK016(ma)003:2429: bde ba rnam bzhi nyams su ma lon pa //
NK016(ma)003:2430: bde bzhir lta ba lhan skyes ngang du bshags //
NK016(ma)003:2431: bde ba rang la gnas par ma shes shing //
NK016(ma)003:2432: sdug bsngal rkyen gyis bde ba ma bsgoms pas //
NK016(ma)003:2433: bde stong rgya chung grub mtha' ma rtogs pa //
NK016(ma)003:2434: lhan cig skyes pa bde ba'i ngang du bshags //
NK016(ma)003:2435: bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpar ma shes pas //
NK016(ma)003:2436: 'chi dus rang nyid der snang skur ma grub //
NK016(ma)003:2437: 'khor lo bzhi yi bde ba ma 'byongs pa //
NK016(ma)003:2438: 'da' kha rdo rje sems dpa'i ngang du bshags //
NK016(ma)003:2439: ye nas bdud rtsi thig le chen po ni //
NK016(ma)003:2440: chos sku dri ma med par gnas pa las //
NK016(ma)003:2441: ma shes ma rtogs bdud rtsi ma sbyangs pa //
NK016(ma)003:2442: 'bras bu chos kyi sku yi ngang du bshags //
NK016(ma)003:2443: dri chen dri chu m+aam sa rak+ta zil //
NK016(ma)003:2444: 'byung ba bzhi ste khams kyi bdud rtsi dgu /
NK016(ma)003:2445: bde ba mchog bde rnam rtog bral bde ba //
NK016(ma)003:2446: lhan skyes ye shes dbang gi ngang du bshags //
NK016(ma)003:2447: zhes gsang ba shes rab ye shes kyi dbang gi bshags pa de ltar gsungs so //
NK016(ma)003:2448: de nas bde ba chen po'i dbang gi bshags pa 'di gsungs so //
NK016(ma)003:2449: thabs dang shes rab gnyis ka rab gnas kyang //
NK016(ma)003:2450: thabs kyi rgyud dang shes rab rgyud dag dang //
NK016(ma)003:2451: gnyis ka'i rgyud la dag par ma spyangs pa //
NK016(ma)003:2452: rdo rje'i rba rlabs lam gsum ngang du gshags //
NK016(ma)003:2453: lus ngag sems dang lus sems gnyis ka la //
NK016(ma)003:2454: phan 'dogs rang la gnas par ma shes pas //
NK016(ma)003:2455: rgyu mthun rnam smin skyes bu byed pa dang //
NK016(ma)003:2456: dri ma med pa'i yon tan ma shes pa //
NK016(ma)003:2457: lta ba'i chos rnams rnam dag ngang du bshags //
NK016(ma)003:2458: lta ba rang gnas nyams su ma myong bas //
NK016(ma)003:2459: 'jig rten 'das pa'i grub mtha'i rtags ma shar //
NK016(ma)003:2460: bde stong rgya che'i grub mtha' ma rtogs pa //
NK016(ma)003:2461: 'khor 'das chos rnams bde stong gcig tu bshags //
NK016(ma)003:2462: sbyangs dang goms dang las la sbyar du med //
NK016(ma)003:2463: ma rtogs dbang gis sbyangs goms las ma sbyar //
NK016(ma)003:2464: srog rtsol rlung la goms par ma gyur pa //
NK016(ma)003:2465: 'da' kha phyag rgya chen po'i ngang du bshags //
NK016(ma)003:2466: ye shes thams cad ngo bo nyid kyi sku //
NK016(ma)003:2467: ma sbyangs gnas lugs don du ma rtogs pas //
NK016(ma)003:2468: lam bstan rdo rje rba rlabs lam ma bsgoms //
NK016(ma)003:2469: 'bras bu ngo bo nyid kyi sku ru bshags //
NK016(ma)003:2470: srog dang rtsol ba lnga yi bdag nyid la //
NK016(ma)003:2471: rtsa ba phung po rnam shes yan lag sogs //
NK016(ma)003:2472: rlung bcu srog shing gsum du ma rtogs pa //
NK016(ma)003:2473: bde ba chen po'i dbang gi klong du bshags //
NK016(ma)003:2474: zhes de kho na nyid bde ba chen po'i dbang gi bshags pa de skad gsungs so //
NK016(ma)003:2475: dri med rgyal po bshags pa'i rgyud las /
NK016(ma)003:2476: thabs lam dbang gi bshags pa ste le'u bcu bzhi pa'o //
NK016(ma)003:2478: // de nas bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis /
NK016(ma)003:2479: 'bras bu rang bzhin yongs su dag pa'i bshags pa 'di gsungs so //
NK016(ma)003:2481: / snang stong zung 'jug spros bral chos kyi sku //
NK016(ma)003:2482: sa thob yan chad theg chen phal rnams la //
NK016(ma)003:2483: mtshan dang dpe byad snang ba longs sku dang //
NK016(ma)003:2484: sbyor lam man chad kun la snang ba yi //
NK016(ma)003:2485: mdzad pa tha dad ston pa sprul pa'i sku //
NK016(ma)003:2486: chos dang gzugs sku dbyer med rdo rje'i sku //
NK016(ma)003:2487: yon tan ma btsal lhun grub mngon byang sku //
NK016(ma)003:2488: de ltar ma rtogs sku lnga'i ngang du bshags //
NK016(ma)003:2489: don gsung chos rnams skye med ngang du gnas //
NK016(ma)003:2490: skye med smra brjod thams cad gzhi ru 'gyur //
NK016(ma)003:2491: rdo rje grags stong dbyer med 'dus ma byas //
NK016(ma)003:2492: mngon byang sgra skad mtha' dag thams cad ni //
NK016(ma)003:2493: rang byung ye shes ngo bo nyid du gsal //
NK016(ma)003:2494: longs sku'i gsung ni rang gi yul rnams la //
NK016(ma)003:2495: brda yi sgo nas 'khor la go brda sprod //
NK016(ma)003:2496: sprul ba'i gsung ni yan lag drug cur snang //
NK016(ma)003:2497: gsung lnga ye nas snang tshu ma rtogs pa //
NK016(ma)003:2498: gsung lnga lhun grub ngang du mthol lo bshags //
NK016(ma)003:2499: stong nyid ye shes dngos po med par gsal //
NK016(ma)003:2500: me long ye shes rtog pa med par shar //
NK016(ma)003:2501: mnyam nyid ye shes bzang ngan med par gsal //
NK016(ma)003:2502: sor rtog spyi dang rang mtshan ma 'dren gsal //
NK016(ma)003:2503: bya grub bdag gzhan don la rtsol med gsal //
NK016(ma)003:2504: gnas tshul ma rtogs thugs lnga'i ngang du bshags //
NK016(ma)003:2505: rang rig byang chub sems nyid zhing khams ni //
NK016(ma)003:2506: mnan na nem la bteg na 'phar la sogs //
NK016(ma)003:2507: rang rig gzhal yas khang snang phyi nang med //
NK016(ma)003:2508: rang rig 'od zer snang ste ba spu yi //
NK016(ma)003:2509: bu ga re nas 'od zer drug cu 'phro //
NK016(ma)003:2510: rig pa rang nyid gdan du snang ba ste //
NK016(ma)003:2511: 'bras bu'i chos rnams thugs su chud pa'i rtags //
NK016(ma)003:2512: rang rig nyid ni rgyan du snang ba ste //
NK016(ma)003:2513: 'khor 'das ma spangs lhun gyis grub pa yi //
NK016(ma)003:2514: yon tan ma rtogs chos nyid ngang du bshags //
NK016(ma)003:2515: nyon mongs rnam par rtog pas sems khengs rnams //
NK016(ma)003:2516: sangs rgyas mdzad pas rgyud mnyen zhi bar mdzad //
NK016(ma)003:2517: rmongs shing dbul dang phongs pa'i gang zag rnams //
NK016(ma)003:2518: shes bya longs spyod mtha' yas rgyas par 'dzad //
NK016(ma)003:2519: mi phan mi dul gyong ba'i gang zag rnams //
NK016(ma)003:2520: dbang gi las kyis bsdu zhing 'dul bar mdzad //
NK016(ma)003:2521: thugs rje thabs kyis mi 'dul gdug pa rnams //
NK016(ma)003:2522: mngon spyod drag pos tshar ni gcod par mdzad //
NK016(ma)003:2523: de ltar ma rtogs rigs rnams bdag po'i ngang //
NK016(ma)003:2524: phyogs ris med cing lhun gyis grub par mdzad //
NK016(ma)003:2525: gcig dang du ma'i ngo bo las grol ba //
NK016(ma)003:2526: spang thob med par rang snang dag tu thob //
NK016(ma)003:2527: las kyi rang bzhin dngos byas nyes pa zad //
NK016(ma)003:2528: gdul bya gzigs pa'i sku gsung thugs la bshags //
NK016(ma)003:2529: zhes sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las lnga'i sgo nas yang dag par bshags pa'o //
NK016(ma)003:2530: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa longs spyod kyi bdag po rnams kyis 'di gsungs so //
NK016(ma)003:2531: rtsa rnams 'gros thim dbyibs kyi lam dag pa //
NK016(ma)003:2532: lus kyi sgrub byang bskyed rim sprul pa'i sku //
NK016(ma)003:2533: yi ge'i 'gros thim sngags kyi lam dag pa //
NK016(ma)003:2534: ngag gi sgrib byang rdzogs rim longs spyod sku /
NK016(ma)003:2535: bdud rtsi khams kyi dwangs ma bcud kyi lam //
NK016(ma)003:2536: sems kyi sgrib dag dwangs ma chos kyi sku //
NK016(ma)003:2537: rlung gi 'gros thim mi shigs rdo rje'i rlung //
NK016(ma)003:2538: lus ngag yid dag ngo bo nyid kyi sku //
NK016(ma)003:2539: de ltar gnas pa ma rtogs klong du ni //
NK016(ma)003:2540: sku bzhi rlung la lhun grub ngang du bshags //
NK016(ma)003:2541: zhes thabs kyi 'bras bu'i bshags pa gsungs so //
NK016(ma)003:2542: dri med rgyal po bshags pa'i rgyud las /
NK016(ma)003:2543: 'bras bu'i don ma rtogs pa bshags pa ste le'u bco lnga pa'o //
NK016(ma)003:2545: // de nas gsang ba'i bdag pos yongs su gtad pa 'di gsungs so //
NK016(ma)003:2547: / sku gsung thugs kyi sprul pa rigs gsum mgon //
NK016(ma)003:2548: de la gtad pas khams gsum sgron me yin //
NK016(ma)003:2549: rigs lnga 'khor gyi mkha' 'gro sde bzhi rnams //
NK016(ma)003:2550: de la gtad pas gsang sngags srung ma yin //
NK016(ma)003:2551: sngon sbyangs gang zag chos kyi spyan ldan rnams //
NK016(ma)003:2552: de la gtad pas bstan pa dar ba yin //
NK016(ma)003:2553: gsungs pa'i rgyud chen lung dang mthun par gtad //
NK016(ma)003:2554: de ltar ma byas bka' srung rnams la bshags //
NK016(ma)003:2556: de nas 'khor rnams mnyes nas sku gsung thugs la bshags pa 'di gsungs so //
NK016(ma)003:2557: dus gsum bde gshegs rgyal bo 'khor dang bcas //
NK016(ma)003:2558: rdo rje dam can ma lus dgongs su gsol //
NK016(ma)003:2559: dang por byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed de //
NK016(ma)003:2560: sgrub pa'i rig 'dzin byang chub go 'phang du //
NK016(ma)003:2561: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje bsgrub pa'i phyir //
NK016(ma)003:2562: yi dam lha dang rdo rje slob dpon dang //
NK016(ma)003:2563: gsang ba'i dam tshig grangs su mnos pa las //
NK016(ma)003:2564: dam bcas bka' las 'da' bar mi bgyi ste //
NK016(ma)003:2565: las dang skal bas dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur //
NK016(ma)003:2566: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug nga rgyal dang //
NK016(ma)003:2567: phrag dog la sogs shor nas nongs bgyis pa //
NK016(ma)003:2568: rdo rje slob dpon bstan pa'i sgron me la //
NK016(ma)003:2569: snying nas smad cing dam tshig nyams pa dang //
NK016(ma)003:2570: dam tshig gcig pa'i rdo rje spun rnams la //
NK016(ma)003:2571: ngan sems log par blta ba la sogs pa //
NK016(ma)003:2572: sku yi dam tshig nyams pa mthol lo bshags //
NK016(ma)003:2573: yi dam lha yi phyag rgya ma gsal zhing //
NK016(ma)003:2574: sngags kyi bsnyen pa grangs las chad pa dang //
NK016(ma)003:2575: dus drug las kyi mchod pa khyad par du //
NK016(ma)003:2576: bsnyen sgrub bskang ba'i cho ga ma bgyis te //
NK016(ma)003:2577: bka' ltar ma lcogs gzhung bzhin rngo ma thogs //
NK016(ma)003:2578: gsung gi dam tshig nyams pa mthol lo bshags //
NK016(ma)003:2579: rdo rje slob dpon byams pa'i bka' drin gyis //
NK016(ma)003:2580: snyan khung brgyud nas sems kyi dkyil du bzhag /
NK016(ma)003:2581: thugs kyi man ngag byin pas dam tshig 'dres //
NK016(ma)003:2582: gsang mtshams 'das nas 'chol bar smras la sogs //
NK016(ma)003:2583: thugs kyi dam tshig nyams pa mthol lo bshags //
NK016(ma)003:2584: chos rnams mnyam pa nyid du ma rtogs te //
NK016(ma)003:2585: yan lag dam tshig nyams pa mthol lo bshags //
NK016(ma)003:2586: le lo snyoms las gnyid kyi dbang gyur te //
NK016(ma)003:2587: bsnyen sgrub dam tshig nyams pa mthol lo bshags //
NK016(ma)003:2588: lus ngag yid kyi bsrung bya 'das pa yis //
NK016(ma)003:2589: sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig nyams pa bshags //
NK016(ma)003:2590: zhes gsungs nas rjes su yi rang ngo //
NK016(ma)003:2591: de nas 'khor phal pa rnams kyis 'di skad gsungs so //
NK016(ma)003:2592: rje btsun bla ma rnams kyi spyan lam du //
NK016(ma)003:2593: yo byad 'byor tshogs chung ba mthol lo bshags //
NK016(ma)003:2594: yi dam lha tshogs rnam kyi spyan lam du //
NK016(ma)003:2595: mngon rtogs spang len bgyis pa mthol lo bshags //
NK016(ma)003:2596: mkha' 'gro sde bzhi rnams kyi spyan lam du //
NK016(ma)003:2597: khas blangs dam bca' nyams pa mthol lo bshags //
NK016(ma)003:2598: chos skyong srung ma rnams kyi spyan lam du //
NK016(ma)003:2599: gtor ma lo zla 'gyangs ba mthol lo bshags //
NK016(ma)003:2600: dus gsum pha ma rnam kyi spyan lam du //
NK016(ma)003:2601: drin la lan gyis ma lon mthol lo bshags //
NK016(ma)003:2602: mched dang lcam dral rnams kyi spyan lam du //
NK016(ma)003:2603: dam tshig brtse gdung chung ba mthol lo bshags //
NK016(ma)003:2604: 'gro drug sems can rnams kyi spyan lam du //
NK016(ma)003:2605: snying rje phan sems chung ba mthol lo bshags //
NK016(ma)003:2606: so sor thar pa rnams kyi sdom pa dang //
NK016(ma)003:2607: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa dang //
NK016(ma)003:2608: rig pa 'dzin pa sngags kyi dam tshig sogs //
NK016(ma)003:2609: nyams pa thams cad mthol bshags mi 'chab bo //
NK016(ma)003:2610: mi sbed slan chad gcod cing sdom par bgyid //
NK016(ma)003:2611: dus gsum byas bsags sdig sgrib mthol bshags na //
NK016(ma)003:2612: tshangs par mdzad nas sku gsung thugs la sogs //
NK016(ma)003:2613: mchog dang thun mong dngos grub stsal du gsol //
NK016(ma)003:2614: zhes gsungs nas 'khor rnams rjes su yi rangs par gyur to //
NK016(ma)003:2615: dri med rgyal po bshags pa'i rgyud las /
NK016(ma)003:2616: yongs su gtad pa'i bshags pa dang rjes su yi rang ba ste le'u bcu drug pa'o //
NK016(ma)003:2618: // dam tshig thams cad kyi nyams chag skong ba'i lung
NK016(ma)003:2619: bshags pa thams cad kyi rgyud dri ma med pa'i
NK016(ma)003:2620: rgyal po zhes bya ba rdzogs so //
NK016(ma)003:2622: // rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi ma la mi tra dang /
NK016(ma)003:2623: bod kyi lo ts+aa ba gnyags dz+ny+aa na ku m+aa ras bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o //
NK016(ma)003:2624: dus phyis yi ge rgyun 'phyugs pas ma dag pa
NK016(ma)003:2625: rnams sngar gyi dpe rnying khungs thub dag la gtugs
NK016(ma)003:2626: shing gong ma'i gsung rgyun dang /
NK016(ma)003:2627: gzhung don la dpyad de rang bzos ma bslad par
NK016(ma)003:2628: dge slong mtsho skyes bzhad pas brda tshig gnyis ka
NK016(ma)003:2629: dpyis phyin par zhus dag par bgyis te yid brtan
NK016(ma)003:2630: du rung ba'i phyi mor basngagasa pa dge zhing bkra
NK016(ma)003:2632: slar yang khams dang dbus phyogs su sngar nas yig
NK016(ma)003:2633: rgyun so sor gyes pas tshig 'bru 'ga' re chad
NK016(ma)003:2634: lhag 'dug pa rnams dge pa na zhabs nas rnying
NK016(ma)003:2635: rgyud spar gyi skabs zhib par bcos te yid brtan
